original.value: Tavor TAR-21

translation.value: Tavor TAR-21

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Low\nThe Tavor TAR-21 is an Israeli bullpup assault rifle chambered for 5.56x45mm NATO ammunition with a selective fire system. It is the standard issued weapon of the Israeli infantry.

translation.value: Attachment Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: low\nThis bullpup assault rifle is manufactured in Israel and is the standard weapon of the Israeli infantry. The weapon uses 5.56x45mm NATO ammunition and has a selective fire system.

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nThe M4A1 is a family of firearms tracing its lineage back to earlier carbine versions of the M16, all based on the original AR-15 designed by Eugene Stoner and made by ArmaLite.

translation.value: Attachment Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: medium\nThe M4A1 is based on the original AR-15 which was designed by Eugene Stoner and made by ArmaLite.

original.value: AUG A3

translation.value: AUG A3

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Low\nThe AUG A3 is an Austrian bullpup 5.56mm assault rifle, designed in the early 1970s by Steyr Mannlicher GmbH & Co KG (formerly Steyr-Daimler-Puch).

translation.value: Attachment Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: low\nThis weapon has been designed by Steyr Mannlicher GmbH & Co KG (former Steyr-Daimler-Puch)in the early 1970s. It is a bullpup 5.56mm assault rifle, manufactured in Austria.

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nThe Kalashnikov AK-103 assault rifle is a modification of the current Russian standard issue AK-74M rifle for older 7.62x39mm ammunition. AK-103 is in use by various Russian special Law Enforcement groups, which prefer 7.62mm over 5.45mm for its better stopping power.

translation.value: Attachment Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: medium\nThis variant of the AK-74M rifle is in use by various Russian special law enforcement groups. They prefer the АK-103 with the 7.62mm over the 5.45mm ammo for its better stopping power.

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nThe XM8 was the U.S. military designation for a lightweight assault rifle system under development by the United States Army from the late 1990s to early 2000s.

translation.value: Attachment Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: medium\nThe United States Army used this lightweight assault weapon, developed from the late 1990s to early 2000s.

translation.value: H&K G36K

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nThe G36K is a German made assault rifle manufactured by Heckler and Koch. It is a variant of the H&K G36. K stands for Kurz, which means short in German.

translation.value: Attachment Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: medium\nThis Heckler & Koch manufactured German assault rifle is a variant of the H&K G36. The "K" in the weapon name stands for "Kurz", which means short in German.

original.value: CALICO M955A

translation.value: CALICO M955A

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nThe CALICO M955A is a blowback-operated full auto dynamic purpose rifle chambered in .22 LR or 9x19mm Parabellum, manufactured by Calico Light Weapons Systems in Hillsboro, Oregon, USA.

translation.value: Attachment Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. . Recoil: medium\nManufactured by Calico Light Weapons Systems in Hillsboro, Oregon, USA, the CALICO M955A is a blowback-operated fully automatic rifle.

original.value: SIG 551

translation.value: SIG 551

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Low\nThe SG 551 has a short pattern 363 mm (14.3 in) barrel, gas tube and piston compared to the SG 550. The SG 551 series rifles have a 466 mm (18.3 in) long sight radius. The handguards were also changed and the bipod removed.

translation.value: Attachment Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: low\nThe modified handguards and the missing bipod distinguish the SIG 551 from the SIG 550. It has a short pattern 363 mm barrel, gas tube and piston, as well as a 466 mm (18.3 in) long sight radius.

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: High\nThe K2 is an assault rifle of the Republic of Korea Armed Forces, manufactured by S&T Daewoo. It is a shoulder-fired, gas-operated, selective-fire assault rifle that feeds from a 20 or 30 round magazine and is chambered for 5.56 NATO.

translation.value: Attachment Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: high\nManufactured by S&T Daewoo, the Daewoo K2 is the primary assault Rifle of the Korean Armed Forces. This selective-fire assault rifle feeds from a 20 or 30 round magazine, is gas-powered and shoulder-fired.

original.value: FN F2000

translation.value: FN F2000

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Low\nThe FN F2000 is a 5.56x45mm NATO bullpup assault rifle, designed by FN Herstal in Belgium. The F2000 made its debut in March 2001 at the IDEX defense exhibition held in Abu Dhabi, in the United Arab Emirates.

translation.value: Attachment Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: low\nThe FN F2000 is a NATO bullpup assault rifle. With a futuristic design to ease the carrying and firing of the weapon, its bulky shape also renders the weapon resilient against extreme conditions.

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nThe AK-47 is a selective-fire, gas-operated 7.62?39mm assault rifle, first developed in the USSR by Mikhail Kalashnikov. It is also known as a Kalashnikov, an "AK", or in Russian slang, Kalash. Even after six decades the model and its variants remain the most widely used and popular assault rifles in the world because of their durability, low production cost, and ease of use.

Recoil: medium\nEven after six decades, variants of this model and the original one remain the most widely used assault rifle in the world, due to their low production cost, durability and ease to use. original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope. Recoil: High\n The AS "Val" (Avtomat Special'nyj Val, Special Automatic Rifle, code name: "Shaft") is a Soviet designed assault rifle featuring an integrated suppressor. It was developed during the late 1980s by TsNIITochMash and is used by Russian Spetsnaz special forces and the MVD, FSB and select units of the Russian Army. Since 1987, it was added to the arsenal of the Soviet Army and the KGB. Its effective range is approximately 300 m, as it uses heavy subsonic 9x39mm SP-6 (high performance armor piercing) ammunition, as well as the SP-5 ball round used by the VSS Vintorez.

translation.value: Attachment Slots: Rail, Scope. Recoil: high\nThe Soviet designed AS-"VAL" (Assault Rifle Garotta) is an assault rifle with an integrated suppressor. Since its development in the late 1980s it has been used by different Russian and Soviet forces like the Spetsnaz, MVD, FSB and some units of the Russian Army. It is part of the Soviet Army and the KGB since 1987. It can use the SP-6, as well as the SP-5 cartridge of the 9x39mm ammunition.

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nThe M1911 is a single-action, semi-automatic, magazine-fed, recoil-operated pistol chambered for the .45 ACP cartridge, which served as the standard-issue sidearm for the United States armed forces from 1911 to 1985. It was first used in later stages of the Philippine-American War, and was widely used in World War I, World War II, the Korean War, and the Vietnam War. The improved design was adopted by US Military as M1911A1 pistol, and served with distinction until the mid-1980s,

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Muzzle. Recoil: High\nThe Glock 18 is a selective fire variant of the Glock 17, developed at the request of the Austrian counter-terrorist unit EKO Cobra. The firearm is typically used with an extended 33-round capacity magazine.

translation.value: FN Five-seveN

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Muzzle. Recoil: Low\nThe FN Five-seven, trademarked as the Five-seveN, is a semi-automatic pistol designed and manufactured by FN Herstal in Belgium. The pistol is named for its 5.7-mm (.224 in) bullet diameter, and the trademark capitalization style is intended to emphasize the manufacturer's initials—FN (Fabrique Nationale of Herstal).

original.value: Nagant M1895

translation.value: Nagant M1895

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nThe Nagant M1895 Revolver is a seven-shot, gas-seal revolver designed and produced by Belgian industrialist L?on Nagant for the Russian Empire. The M1895 revolver was used extensively by the Russian Imperial Army and later by the Soviet Union after the Russian Revolution. In Russian service, it was known for its extreme sturdiness and ability to withstand abuse. As one former Imperial Russian officer stated, "if anything went wrong with the M1895, you could fix it with a hammer"

translation.value: Attachment Slots: Muzzle. Recoil: medium\nUsed extensively by the Russian Imperial Army and later by the Soviet Union after the Russian Revolution, the Nagant M1895 was known for its extreme sturdiness and ability to withstand abuse. It is a seven-shot, gas-seal revolver designed and produced by Belgian industrialist Léon Nagant for the Russian Empire,and a former Imperial Russian officer stated, "if anything went wrong with the Nagant M1895, you could fix it with a hammer".

original.value: RHINO 60DS

translation.value: Rhino 60 DS

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Low\nThe Chiappa Rhino is a revolver produced by Chiappa Firearms of Italy.The new Chiappa Rhino has revolutionized the revolver with a patented design that tames the prehistoric characteristic that most revolvers possess. It is aligned with the bottom most chamber which is the key component to Rhino's tame characteristics. The position of the barrel lowers the center of gravity and yields a centerline of the bore more in line with the shooter's arm allowing for the most natural "point ability" while engaging a target. This characteristic also drastically reduces both recoil and muzzle flip which insures subsequent shots to be on target faster than ever before.

translation.value: Attachment Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: low\nWith its patented design, the Rhino 60 DS has revolutionized the revolver. With the bottom most chamber it tames the prehistoric characteristics that most revolvers possess. So the center of gravity gets lowered and this reduces the the recoil and the muzzle flip.

original.value: MP-443 Grach

translation.value: MP-443 Grach

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Muzzle. Recoil: Low\nThis handgun was developed under designation "Grach" in response to Russian military trials, which began in 1993. In 2003, it was adopted as a standard sidearm for all branches of Russian military and law enforcement, alongside Makarov PM, GSh-18, and SPS. It is chambered for the high-powered 9x19mm 7N21 cartridge, the Russian version of 9mm NATO, loaded to comparable pressure specifications. The 7N21 features an armour-piercing bullet with a tempered steel core.

translation.value: Attachment Slots: Muzzle\nChambered with the Russian version of the 9mm NATO ammunition, the MP-443 Grach bullets are armour-piercing with a tempered steel core. It has been adapted as a standard sidearm in Russia for all military and law enforcement units.

original.value: Attachment's Slots: none. Recoil: Medium\nThe Pancor Corporation Jackhammer is a 12-gauge, gas-operated automatic shotgun. It is one of very few fully automatic shotguns, and although patented in 1987, it never entered full-scale production.

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nThe Saiga is a Kalashnikov-pattern 12 gauge combat shotgun available in a wide range of configurations. Like the Kalashnikov rifle variants, it is a rotating bolt, gas-operated gun that feeds from a box magazine.

translation.value: Daewoo K1

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Low\nThe Daewoo K1/K1A assault carbine is the first modern firearm developed by Agency of Defense Development (ADD) and manufactured by S&T Daewoo, and entered service in Republic of Korea Armed Forces in 1981.

translation.value: Attachment Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: low\nFirst used in the Republic of Korea Armed Forces in 1981, the Daewoo K1/1A assault carbine is the first modern firearm developed by the Agency of Defense Development, manufactured by S&T Daewoo.

original.value: M4 CQB

translation.value: M4 CQB

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Low\nThe Close Quarters Battle Receiver (CQBR) is a replacement upper receiver for the M4A1 Carbine. The CQBR replaces the M4 with a barrel 10.3 in (262 mm) length making it the modern equivalent of the Colt Commando short-barrel M16 variants of the past.

translation.value: Attachment Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: low\nThe CQBR (Close Quarters Battle Receiver), with its 262mm-long barrel is the modern equivalent of iconic Commando variants, and the replacement for the M4A1 Carbine.

original.value: Daewoo K7

translation.value: Daewoo K7

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope. Recoil: Low\nThe Daewoo Precision Industries K7 was announced in 2003 as a 9 mm suppressed submachine gun (with permanent suppressor) for use with the South-Korean special forces. It was first displayed in the United Arab Emirates at the IDEX (International Defence Exhibition) 2003 convention. The K7 is under manufacture by S&T Daewoo.

translation.value: Attachment Slots: Scope. Recoil: low\nThe Daewoo K7 was presented to the public for the first time at the International Defence Exhibition in the United Arab Emirates during the 2003 convention. It has a permanent suppressor and fires 9mm ammunition.

original.value: MPA 10SST-X

translation.value: MPA 10SST-X

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Low\nThe MPA10SST-X is highly customizable modern weapon, compact weapon constructions and high RPM makes it very effective in close combat.

translation.value: Attachment Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: low\nThe German Army Weapon Office realized the need for a compact submachine gun suitable for use by armored vehicle crews and paratroopers, so the MPA 10SST-X submachine gun came into service.

original.value: Skorpion vz. 83

translation.value: Skorpion vz. 83

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail. Recoil: Low\nThe Skorpion vz. 83 is a Czechoslovak .380ACP submachine gun developed in 1959 by Miroslav Rybar (1924–1970) and produced under the official designation Samopal vzor 61 ("submachine gun model 1961") by the Ceska zbrojovka arms factory in Uhersky Brod.

translation.value: Attachment Slots: Rail. Recoil: low\nDeveloped in the 1950s, the Skorpion vz. 83 is a Czechoslovakian.380ACP submachine gun.

original.value: H&K UMP

translation.value: H&K UMP

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nThe UMP is a submachine gun developed and manufactured by Heckler & Koch. It is a recoil-operated, magazine-fed submachine gun firing from a closed bolt. The UMP is chambered for larger cartridges than other submachine guns like the MP5.

translation.value: Attachment Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: medium\nManufactured and developed by Heckler & Koch, the UMP is a recoil-operated, magazine-fed submachine gun that fires from a closed bolt. Unlike other submachine guns, it is chambered for larger cartidges for more stopping power.

original.value: PP-19 Bizon

translation.value: PP-19 Bizon

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium PP-19 Bizon 9x19mm was developed at the request of the Russian Ministry of Internal Affairs by team of engineers headed by Victor Kalashnikov (son of famed AK-47 designer Mikhail Kalashnikov). It's primarily intended for counter-terrorist and law enforcement units that usually need fast and accurate fire at close ranges. One of the Bizon's more unusual features is the magazine, which is often confused for a grenade launcher. The cylinder below the barrel is in fact a 64-round helical-feed magazine, similar to the type used in the American Calico.

translation.value: Attachment Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: medium\nIntended for counter-terrorist and law enforcement units as a weapon with fast and accurate fire at close range, the Russian Ministry of Internal Affairs requested the development of this weapon from the son of the famous weapon developer Kalashnikov. The cylinder below the barrel is often confused as a grenade launcher, but is in fact a helical feed magazine.

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Low\nThe ACR CQB is variation of The Adaptive Combat Rifle (abbreviated ACR) which was a United States Army program to find a replacement for the M16 assault rifle. translation.value: Beretta MX4 Storm

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Low\nBeretta MX4 submachine gun is the newest product of the world’s oldest gun making company, Beretta of Italy. original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: High\nThis weapon deal increased damage against cyborgs on 50%.\nThe WA 2000 is a semi-automatic bullpup sniper rifle that was produced by the Carl Walther GmbH Sportwaffen company. It was produced in three different calibers. Production of the rifle was limited and it was shortly stopped because it was too expensive to achieve widespread sales and not robust enough for military use as a sniper rifle. Only 176 were built due to the high cost of the rifle making it currently rare and valuable .

original.value: DSA sa58 spr

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: High This weapon deal increased damage against cyborgs on 50%. DSA’s entry for the Army’s SASS trials was their SPR or Special Purpose Rifle DS Arms (DSA) has been producing high quality rifles based on the FN FAL design. The SPR is a gas-operated, semi-automatic rifle based around the SA58 design.

translation.value: Attachment Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: high This weapon deals increased by 50% damage against cyborgs. This gas-operated, semi-automatic rifle was designed to match the evolving demands of a sniper's role in battle. Always go for the kill with this sniper rifle; if your enemy isn’t taken out on impact, the high velocity of its bullets will still knock them to the ground. With snipers increasingly expected to take down multiple targets in a single skirmish, the SR58 ushered in the era of the SASS – Semi-Automatic Sniper System.

original.value: Dragunov SVU-AS

translation.value: Dragunov SVU-AS

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope. Recoil: Low\nThis weapon deal increased damage against cyborgs on 50%.\nThe OTs-03 SVU aka Sniper Rifle Shortened is a bullpup configuration of the SVD sniper rifle. The SVU was developed to meet the needs of the security forces of the Russian Ministry of Internal Affairs, such as OMON. A special muzzle brake was added that could absorb up to 40% of the recoil energy and an elastic butt stock with lamellar spring was non-rigidly attached to the receiver. The acoustics of the rifle were also improved by adding a sound suppressor. The other main improvements made to the SVU over the SVD include replacement of the butt stock, pistol grip, trigger and the mounting for the sight; and shortening the barrel by 100 mm achieved perfect balance for the weapon.

translation.value: Attachment Slots: Rail, Scope. Recoil: low\nThis weapon deals increased by 50% damage against cyborgs.\nThe Dragunov SVU-AS was developed to meet the needs of the security forces of the Russian Ministry of Internal Affairs. A special muzzle brake was added that could absorb up to 40% of the recoil energy and an elastic butt stock with lamellar spring was non-rigidly attached to the receiver. The acoustics of the rifle were also improved by adding a sound suppressor. It also includes an upgraded butt stock, pistol grip, trigger and the mounting for the sight. Finally, shortening the barrel by 100 mm achieves perfect balance for the weapon.

The acoustics of the rifle were also improved by adding a sound suppressor. The other main improvements made to the SVU over the SVD include replacement of the butt stock, pistol grip, trigger and the mounting for the sight; and shortening the barrel by 100 mm achieved perfect balance for the weapon.

original.value: Mosin Model 1891/30

translation.value: Mosin Model 1891/30

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Muzzle. Recoil: High\nModel 1891/30 is the most prolific version of the Mosin–Nagant. It was produced for standard issue to all Soviet infantry from 1930 to 1945. Most Dragoon rifles were also converted to the M1891/30 standard. It was commonly used as a sniper rifle in World War II. Early sniper versions had a 4x PE or PEM scope, a Soviet-made copy of a Zeiss design, while later rifles used smaller, simpler, and easier-to-produce 3.5x PU scopes.

translation.value: Attachment Slots: Muzzle. Recoil: high\nCommonly used as a sniper rifle in World War II, the M 1891/30 was produced for standard issue to all Soviet infantry from 1930 to 1945. Consequently, it was a commonly used sniper rifle in World War II and most of the Dragunov rifles were converted to the Mosin model 1891/30 standard. Early versions of it had a 4x scope, but later ones used smaller, simpler and easier-to-produce 3.5x scopes.

original.value: S&W Survival Tanto Blade

translation.value: S&W Survival Tanto Blade

original.value: S&W Survival Tanto Blade \n It is made by Smith and Wesson. The blade is a tanto configuration, based on the short knife Samurai warriors, in feudal Japan carried. To make it more modern Morgan Taylor, the designer, added the serrated edge on the top. It's a deadly beast.

translation.value:
<font size='14' color='#DDDDDD'>This deadly beast is a tanto configuration, which is based on the short knife Samurai warriors carried in the feudal Japan. The serrated edge adds a more modern look this version.</font>
<font size='14' color='#DDDDDD'>Primary Attack Stats:
Damage:</font><font size='14' color='#ff4400'> 62</font><font size='14' color='#DDDDDD'>
Range:</font><font size='14' color='#ff4400'> 1.6</font><font size='14' color='#DDDDDD'>
Speed:</font><font size='14' color='#ff4400'> 6.25 attacks/s</font><font size='14' color='#DDDDDD'>
DPS:</font><font size='14' color='#ff4400'> 387.5</font><font size='14' color='#DDDDDD'>
Secondary Attack Stats:
Damage:</font><font size='14' color='#ff4400'> 125</font><font size='14' color='#DDDDDD'>
Range:</font><font size='14' color='#ff4400'> 1.8</font><font size='14' color='#DDDDDD'>
Speed:</font><font size='14' color='#ff4400'> 1.25 attacks/s</font><font size='14' color='#DDDDDD'>
DPS:</font><font size='14' color='#ff4400'> 156</font>

original.value: Katana This sword can hit enemies on increased distance. Katana has increased damage. Secondary melee attack is so strong that even will kill enemy in Anti Melee Vests! The katana is characterized by its distinctive appearance: a curved, slender, single-edged blade with a circular or squared guard and long grip to accommodate two hands. It has historically been associated with the samurai of feudal Japan and has become renowned for its sharpness and strength.

translation.value:
<font size='14' color='#DDDDDD'>The Katana has become worldwide renowned for its sharpness. Used by the samurai of feudal Japan and usually wielded with two hands, its secondary melee attack is so strong that it will even kill enemies in an Anti Melee Vest!</font>
<font size='14' color='#DDDDDD'>Primary Attack Stats:
Damage:</font><font size='14' color='#ff4400'> 80</font><font size='14' color='#DDDDDD'>
Range:</font><font size='14' color='#ff4400'> 2.1</font><font size='14' color='#DDDDDD'>
Speed:</font><font size='14' color='#ff4400'> 3.57 attacks/s</font><font size='14' color='#DDDDDD'>
DPS:</font><font size='14' color='#ff4400'> 285</font><font size='14' color='#DDDDDD'>
Secondary Attack Stats:
Damage:</font><font size='14' color='#ff4400'> 160</font><font size='14' color='#DDDDDD'>
Range:</font><font size='14' color='#ff4400'> 2.4</font><font size='14' color='#DDDDDD'>
Speed:</font><font size='14' color='#ff4400'> 1.17 attacks/s</font><font size='14' color='#DDDDDD'>
DPS:</font><font size='14' color='#ff4400'> 188</font>

original.value: ICE-AXE \n An ice-axe is a multi-purpose ice and snow tool used by mountaineers both in the ascent and descent of routes which involve frozen conditions. It can be held and employed in a number of different interesting ways...

translation.value:
<font size='14' color='#DDDDDD'>This multi-purpose tool is designed for ice and snow and mountaineers all around the world use it.</font>

Damage:</font><font size='14' color='#ff4400'> 65</font><font size='14' color='#DDDDDD'>

DPS:</font><font size='14' color='#ff4400'> 255</font><font size='14' color='#DDDDDD'>

original.value: CLEAVER \n Old chinese cleaver is largely used as a kitchen or butcher knife. But it could also be used as weapon.

translation.value:
<font size='14' color='#DDDDDD'>A cleaver is usually used in the kitchen to make tasty food, but they also make tasty weapons...</font>

original.value: TACTICAL AXE This Axe can hit enemies on increased distance. Tactical Axe increased damage. Secondary melee attack could kill enemy in Anti Melee Vests! Tactical Axe often used in both ways as a tool and good melee weapon. That is why Tactical Axe has become increasingly popular recently in both the law enforcement and active duty military community. Tactical Axe often used in both ways as a tool and good melee weapon.

original.value: Jagdkommando \n Jagdkommando is a unique knife that has been milled from a solid piece of stainless steel.Named after the Austrian Armed Special Forces Operation group, the Jagdkommando lives up to its elite namesake.The blade's three sharpened edges twist as they come to a point while the grooved faces feature drilled holes that flow seamlessly together.

translation.value:
<font size='14' color='#DDDDDD'>The Jagdkommando is an unique knife that has been milled from a solid piece of stainless steel. Named after the Austrian Armed Special Forces Operation group, the Jagdkommando lives up to its elite namesake. The blade's three sharpened edges twist as they come to a point while the grooved faces feature drilled holes that flow seamlessly together.</font>

Damage:</font><font size='14' color='#ff4400'> 90</font><font size='14' color='#DDDDDD'>

original.value: Basic Armor Kit

translation.value: Basic Armor Kit

original.value: Basic Armor Kit \n Basic equipment for damaged armor repairing. This kit provides only basic ability of armor reparing.

translation.value: Make critical repairs to damaged armor with this basic kit.

original.value: Plate Armor Kit

translation.value: “Plate” Armor Kit

original.value: Plate Armor Kit Ideal choice for team players who rely not only on themselves but also used to help allies on the battlefield. This armor kit can restore armor with increased speed. Also plate armor kit can restore armor on increased distance.

translation.value: "Plate" Armor Kit Ideal choice for team players who rely not only on themselves but also help their allies on the battlefield. This armor kit restores armor with an increased speed and from a greater distance.

original.value: Composite Armor Kit

translation.value: “Composite” Armor Kit

original.value: Composite Armor Kit Ideal choice for independent fighters who rely only on themselves. This armor kit can restore armor with increased speed. Lightweight composite kit has slightly increased armor recovery rate.

translation.value: "Composite" Armor Kit\nIdeal choice for independent fighters who rely only on themselves.\nThis kit restores armor in the fastest way possible and has a slightly increased armor recovery rate.

original.value: Basic Ammo Pack

translation.value: Basic Ammo Pack

original.value: Basic Ammo Pack \n Basic equipment for resupplying ammo to players. Numbers of bullet supply is limited

translation.value: Resupply a limited amount of ammo to your teammates.

original.value: Сapacious Ammo Pack

translation.value: “Platoon” Ammo Pack

original.value: Сapacious Ammo Pack Capacious ammo pack has increased ammunition replenishment speed But amount of boxes restricted to 5 You can hit your foe with this box pretty badly !

translation.value: "Platoon" Ammo Pack\nThe "Platoon" ammo pack increases ammunition replenishment speed, and equips you to do some serious damage to enemies.

original.value: Infantry Ammo Pack

translation.value: “Scout” Ammo Pack

original.value: Infantry Ammo Pack Handy infantry ammo pack has significalty increased speed of replenishment of ammunition Soldier can carry 15 boxes

translation.value: "Scout" Ammo Pack This handy "Scout" Ammo Pack has a significantly increased speed for ammunition replenishment. Soldier will carry up to 15 boxes into battle

original.value: M18 Claymore
M18 Claymore \n The M18A1 Claymore is a directional anti-personnel mine used by the U.S. military.

translation.value: The Claymore is a directional anti-personnel mine used by the U.S. military.

original.value: Anti-personnel mine

translation.value: Anti-Personnel Mine

original.value: Anti-personnel mine \n Special mine, which has a 360 degrees activation trigger.

translation.value: This special mine has a 360 degree activation trigger.

original.value: Crywar Claymore

translation.value: Crywar Claymore

original.value: TBD_Ammor Kit III

translation.value: TBD_Ammor Kit III

original.value: Anti-personnel mine \n Special mine, which has a 360 degrees activation trigger. \n Consumable item! Item will disappear after being used.

translation.value: This special mine has a 360 degree activation trigger. This consumable item will disappear after use.

original.value: Christmas Claymore

translation.value: Christmas Gift Box

original.value: Christmas Claymore. In the days of Christmas necessary to be kind and cheerful ! And be sure to give gifts, even to your enemies… This explosive present is designed exactly to such purpose! Gladden your opponent with burst of joy =)

translation.value: <font size='14' color='#DDDDDD'>At Christmas time it's compulsory to be kind and cheerful!\nBe sure to give gifts, even to your enemies…\nThis explosive present is perfect for them =)</font>

original.value: Basic Defibrillator

translation.value: Basic Defibrillator

original.value: Basic Defibrillator \n This defibrillator can revive dead teammate. After used, medic has to wait some time to use once more.

translation.value: After reviving a teammate with this defibrillator, medics will have to wait while it recharges before they can put it to work again.

original.value: Resuscitation Defibrillator

translation.value: “Resuscitation” Defibrillator

original.value: Resuscitation defibrillator \n This defibrillator has increased range of resurection \n

translation.value: "Resuscitation" defibrillator\nThis defibrillator has an increased range for resurrections\n

original.value: Portable Defibrillator

translation.value: “Portable” Defibrillator

original.value: Portable defibrillator This defibrillator reanimates allies with increased ammount of health Energy efficient batteries provides increased speed of operation. Also, this defibrillator is ideal to fry enemies with high voltage !

translation.value: "Portable" defibrillator\nThis defibrillator revives allies with an increased ammount of health\nThe energy-efficient batteries also provide increased operational speed and are ideal for frying enemies with high voltage!

original.value: M26 \n The M26 is a fragmentation grenade developed by the United States military. Its distinct lemon shape led it to being nicknamed the "lemon grenade".

translation.value: The M26 is a fragmentation grenade developed by the United States military. Its distinct shape led it to being nicknamed the "lemon grenade".

original.value: Crywar Grenade

translation.value: Crywar Grenade

original.value: Crywar Grenade\n This grenade has increased damage.

translation.value: Cause additional damage with this highly powerful grenade.

original.value: Knock-back Grenade\n This grenade has knock-back effect. \n Consumable item! Item will disappear after being used.

translation.value: The blast effect from this explosive will knock down enemies. This consumable item will disappear after use.

original.value: Destructive Grenade

translation.value: FG4 Grenade

original.value: Destructive Grenade\n This grenade has increased blast radius and damage. An excellent weapon against a large cluster of enemies..

translation.value: <font size='14'>Defensive grenade</font>\n<font size='14' color='#DDDDDD'>This grenade has <font color='#42ebf8'>increased blast radius and damage</font>. Use it to clear groups of enemies closing down on you and your teammates.</font>

original.value: Offensive grenade

translation.value: Offensive grenade

original.value: Offensive grenade\n This grenade has increased explosion delay.

translation.value: <font size='14'>Offensive grenade</font>\n<font size='14' color='#DDDDDD'>This grenade has an increased explosion delay. Time your throw carefully to ravage the enemy ranks.</font>

original.value: Zongzi Grenade

translation.value: Fireworks Grenade

original.value: Zongzi Grenade \n Unique grenade specially designed for Dragon Boat Festival. It has an unique visual effect of explosion.

translation.value: <font size='14' color='#DDDDDD'>This unique explosive summons a fiery dragon onto your enemies.</font>

original.value: M84 \n This is basic flash grenade of the United States Army.

translation.value: The basic flash grenade of the United States Army.

original.value: M84 II

translation.value: M84 II

original.value: M84 II\n This is advanced version of M84 - blind time and blind area are increased in this grenade.

translation.value: An advanced version of the M84 increases the area in which enemies will be blinded and duration for which they can't see

original.value: M84 II

translation.value: M84 II

translation.value: Gas Grenade

original.value: Gas Grenade \n is basic flash grenade that soldier can use. It is a typical flash grenade.

translation.value: A basic flash grenade that can be put to devastating use in skillful hands.

original.value: Knockback Grenade

translation.value: Knockback Grenade

original.value: Knockback Grenade \n is basic knockback grenade that soldier can use. When player or AI hit by this grenade, he will knockdown.

translation.value: Bowl over enemy soldiers with this powerful weapon of war.

original.value: Medkit \n This medkit can heal wounded teammate. Total amount of healing at one time is limited.

translation.value: Allows medics to provide limited healing to teammates.

original.value: Paramedic Medkit

translation.value: “Paramedic” Medkit

original.value: "Paramedic" MedKit Ideal choice for team players who rely not only on themselves but also used to help allies on the battlefield. This MedKit can restore health with increased speed. "Paramedic" MedKit restore health on increased distance

translation.value: "Paramedic" MedKit\nIdeal choice for team players who rely not only on themselves but also use to help allies on the battlefield.\nThis MedKit can restore health with an increased speed and from a greater distance.

original.value: Plantago Medkit

translation.value: “Adrenalin” Medkit

original.value: "Plantago" MedKit Ideal choice for independent fighters who rely only on themselves. This MedKit can restore HP with increased speed. MedKit has increased recovery amount of health.

translation.value: "Adrenalin" MedKit\nIdeal choice for independent fighters who rely only on themselves.\nThis MedKit can restore HP with an increased speed and increases the amount of health recovered.

original.value: Desert Eagle Camo

translation.value: Desert Eagle Camo

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle\n The Desert Eagle Camo is a large-framed gas-operated semi-automatic pistol designed by Magnum Research in the U.S., and manufactured primarily in Israel by IMI (Israel Military Industries, now Israel Weapon Industries).

translation.value: Attachment Slots: Scope, Muzzle\nThe large-framed, gas-operated semi-automatic Desert Eagle pistol was designed by Magnum Research in the U.S. and is primarily manufactured by Israel Military Industries.

original.value: Glock 18C Platinum

translation.value: Glock 18C Platinum

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Muzzle\n Special platinum version of the Glock 17.\n The Glock 18 is a selective fire variant of the Glock 17, developed at the request of the Austrian counter-terrorist unit EKO Cobra. This machine pistol-class firearm has a lever-type fire-control selector. With the selector lever in the bottom position, the pistol will shoot fully automatic. The firearm is typically used with an extended 33-round capacity magazine.

translation.value: Attachment Slots: Muzzle\nThe Glock 18C is a selective fire variant of the Glock 17, developed at the request of an Austrian counter-terrorist unit. This machine pistol-class has a lever-type fire-control selector. With the selector lever in the bottom position, the pistol becomes fully automatic.

original.value: M4 CQB Platinum

translation.value: M4 CQB Platinum

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle\n Special platinum version of the M4CQB.\n The Close Quarters Battle Receiver (CQBR) is a replacement upper receiver for the M4A1 Carbine. The CQBR replaces the M4 with a barrel 10.3 in (262 mm) length making it the modern equivalent of the Colt Commando short-barrel M16 variants of the past.

translation.value: Attachment Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle\nSpecial platinum version of the M4 CQB which is with its 262mm-long barrel the modern equivalent of iconic Commando variants, and the replacement for the M4A1 Carbine.

original.value: M4A1 Winter Camo

translation.value: M4A1 Winter Camo

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle\n Special Winter camouflage version of the M4A1. \n The M4A1 is a family of firearms tracing its lineage back to earlier carbine versions of the M16, all based on the original AR-15 designed by Eugene Stoner and made by ArmaLite.

translation.value: Attachment Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: high\nSpecial Winter Camo version of the M4A1.\nThe M4A1 is a family of firearms tracing its lineage back to earlier carbine versions of the M16, all based on the original AR-15 designed by Eugene Stoner and made by ArmaLite.

original.value: CALICO M955A Winter Camo

translation.value: CALICO M955A Winter Camo

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Low\nSpecial Winter camouflage version of the CALICO M955A. \n The CALICO M955A is a blowback-operated full auto dynamic purpose rifle chambered in .22 LR or 9x19mm Parabellum, manufactured by Calico Light Weapons Systems in Hillsboro, Oregon, USA.

translation.value: Attachment Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Special Winter Camo version of the CALICO M955A.. Recoil: low\nManufactured by Calico Light Weapons Systems in Hillsboro, Oregon, USA, the CALICO M955A is a blowback-operated fully automatic rifle.

original.value: AUG A3 9mm XS Winter Camo

translation.value: AUG A3 9mm XS Winter Camo

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nSpecial Winter camouflage version of the AUG A3 9mm XS. \n The original Steyr AUG Para 9mm submachine gun is a reversible conversion of the original Steyr AUG assault rifle, intended mostly for short-range police and special operations work. This weapons combines relatively compact dimensions with very good accuracy.

translation.value: Attachment Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: medium\nSpecial Winter Camo version of the AUG A3 9mm XS.\nIntended mostly for short-range police and special operations work, the original Para 9mm SMG combines relatively compact dimensions with very good accuracy, and is a variant of the original AUG A3 assault rifle.

original.value: MC 255 12 Winter Camo

translation.value: MC 255 12 Winter Camo

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nSpecial Winter camouflage version of the MC 255 12. \n Revolving shotgun MC 255 12 developed int the Central Design Bureau of Research sporting and hunting weapons (CDBR SHW) in Tula in the 1990s.

translation.value: Attachment Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: medium\nSpecial Winter Camo version of the MC 255 12.\nThe revolving shotgun MC 255 12 is developed by the Central Design Bureau of Sporting and Hunting Weapons in the 1990s. With its unique design, it became civilian gun aficiandos' favorite.

original.value: H&K MP5 Winter Camo

translation.value: H&K MP5 Winter Camo

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nSpecial Winter camouflage version of the H&K MP5. \n The H&K MP5 is a 9mm submachine gun of German design, developed in the 1960s by a team of engineers from the German small arms manufacturer Heckler & Koch GmbH (H&K).

translation.value: Attachment Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: medium\nSpecial Winter Camo version of the H&K MP5.\nDeveloped in the 1960s by a team of engineers, the H&K MP5, from the German small arms manufacturer Heckler & Koch GmbH, is a 9mm submachine gun.

original.value: H&K USP Winter Camo

translation.value: H&K USP Winter Camo

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nSpecial Winter camouflage version of the H&K USP. \n The USP is a semi-automatic pistol developed in Germany by Heckler & Koch GmbH (H&K).

translation.value: Attachment Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: medium\nSpecial Winter Camo version of the H&K USP.\nThe German USP is a semi-automatic pistol developed by Heckler & Koch, in use by several special operation forces.

original.value: Saiga Winter Camo

translation.value: Saiga Winter Camo

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nSpecial Winter camouflage version of the Saiga. \n The Saiga is a Kalashnikov-pattern 12 gauge combat shotgun available in a wide range of configurations. Like the Kalashnikov rifle variants, it is a rotating bolt, gas-operated gun that feeds from a box magazine.

translation.value: Attachment Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: medium\nSpecial Winter Camo version of the Saiga.\nThe Saiga is a 12 gauge gas-operated combat shotgun that feeds from a box magazine. It is available in a wide range of configurations to meet different expectations of different armed forces worldwide.

original.value: AWM Winter Camo

translation.value: AWM Winter Camo

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Rail, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium Special Winter camouflage version of the AWM. This weapon deal increased damage against cyborgs on 200%. The AWM (Arctic Warfare Magnum) is a sniper rifle manufactured by Accuracy International. The AWM features a detachable box magazine which holds five rounds.

translation.value: Attachment Slots: Scope, Rail, Muzzle. Recoil: medium\nSpecial Winter Camo version of the AWM.\nManufactured by Accuracy International, the AWM (Arctic Warfare Magnum) is a sniper rifle with a detachable 5-round box magazine, and was the first of the "sniper-only" designs ever made.

original.value: CheyTac M200 Winter Camo

translation.value: CheyTac M200 Winter Camo

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope. Recoil: Low Special Winter camouflage version of the CheyTac M200. This weapon deal increased damage against cyborgs on 200%. The CheyTac Intervention is an American bolt action sniper rifle manufactured by CheyTac LLC for long range soft target interdiction. It is fed by a detachable single stack magazine, which holds 7 rounds. CheyTac one of the longest ranges of all modern-day sniper rifles.

translation.value: Attachment Slots: Scope. Recoil: medium This weapon deals increased by 200% damage against cyborgs. Special Winter Camo version of the CheyTac M200. Fed from a detachable single stack magazine holding 7 rounds, the CheyTac M200 covers ranges unequalled by most modern-day sniper rifles. It is a bolt-action sniper rifle for long-range combat, manufactured in America.

original.value: AUG A3 H_bar Winter Camo

translation.value: AUG A3 Hbar Winter Camo

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: High\nSpecial Winter camouflage version of the AUG A3 H_bar. \n AUG A3 H_bar a longer, heavier-barreled version of AUG A3, used as a light machine gun.

translation.value: Attachment Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: high\nSpecial Winter Camo version of the AUG A3 Hbar.\nThe AUG A3 Hbar is a longer, heavier-barreled version of the AUG A3, used as a light machine gun.

original.value: FN P90 Winter Camo

translation.value: FN P90 Winter Camo

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nSpecial Winter camouflage version of the FN P90. \n The FN P90 is a selective fire personal defense weapon (PDW) designed and manufactured by FN Herstal in Belgium. It was designed as a compact but powerful firearm for vehicle crews, operators of crew-served weapons, support personnel, special forces and counter-terrorist groups.

translation.value: Attachment Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: medium\nSpecial Winter Camo version of the FN P90.\nDesigned to be a compact but powerful firearm, the FN P90 is a selective-fire personal defense weapon designed for vehicle crews, support personnel, special forces and counter terrorist units. It is designed and manufactured in Belgium, and was the first unorthodox design to be introduced to the SMG family.

original.value: Benelli Nova tactical Winter Camo

translation.value: Benelli Nova tactical Winter Camo

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nSpecial Winter camouflage version of the Benelli Nova tactical. \n The Nova shotgun is the latest development in the pump shotguns from famous Italian company Benelli Armi. Nova tactical shotgun is built to use most powerful 3 and 3 1/2 inch magnum shotshells.

translation.value: Attachment Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: medium\nSpecial Winter Camo version of the Benelli Nova tactical.\nThis latest development from a famous Italian company Benelli Armi, uses the most powerful 3 and 3 1/2 inch magnum shotshells.

original.value: XM8 Sharpshooter Winter Camo

translation.value: XM8 Sharpshooter Winter Camo

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope. Recoil: Low This weapon deal increased damage against cyborgs on 50%. Special Winter camouflage version of the XM8 Sharpshooter. The XM8 Sharpshooter is special modification of XM8 which turns it to highly effective weapon for long-distance combat.

translation.value: Attachment Slots: Rail, Scope. Recoil: low This weapon deals increased by 50% damage against cyborgs. Special Winter Camo version of the XM8 Sharpshooter. The XM8 Sharpshooter is a special modification of XM8 which turns it into a highly effective weapon for long-distance combat.

original.value: Steyr M9A1 Winter Camo

translation.value: Steyr M9A1 Winter Camo

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nSpecial Winter camouflage version of the Steyr M9A1.\n The Steyr M9A1 is a series of semi-automatic pistols developed by Steyr Mannlicher GmbH & Co KG of Austria for police services and the civilian shooting market. Design work on the new pistol began in the early 1990s and the final product known as the M9.

translation.value: Attachment Slots: Muzzle. Recoil: medium\nSpecial Winter Camo version of the Steyr M9A1.\nThe semi-automatic pistol Steyr M9A1 is part of a series that is developed for police services and the civilian market. The Steyr Mannlicher GmbH & Co KG began the design work on the new pistol in the early 1990s. The final product is known as M9.

original.value: H&K G36K Jungle

translation.value: H&K G36K Jungle

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Low\nSpecial jungle camo version of the G36K.\n The G36K is a German made assault rifle manufactured by Heckler and Koch. It is a variant of the H&K G36. K stands for Kurz, which means short in German..

translation.value: Attachment Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: low\nSpecial Jungle version of the H&K G36K.\nThis Heckler & Koch manufactured German assault rifle is a variant of the H&K G36. The "K" in the weapon name stands for "Kurz", which means short in German.

original.value: Cobray Striker Jungle

translation.value: Cobray Striker Jungle

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nSpecial jungle camo version of the Corbray Striker.\n The Cobray Striker (also known as Sentinel Arms Co Striker-12, Protecta) is a revolver 12-gauge shotgun designed for riot control and combat. It was created in Zimbabwe by Hilton Walker in the early 1980s.

translation.value: Attachment Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: medium\nSpecial Jungle version of the Cobray Striker.\nDesigned for riot control and combat, the Cobray Striker is a 12-gauge shotgun that balances stopping power and maneuverability.

original.value: H&K MP7 Jungle

translation.value: H&K MP7 Jungle

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nSpecial jungle camo version of the MP7.\n The MP7 is a German submachine gun manufactured by Heckler & Koch (H&K) and chambered for the 4.6x30mm cartridge. It was designed in conjunction with the new cartridge to meet NATO requirements published in 1980 calling for a personal defense weapon class firearm.

translation.value: Attachment Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: medium\nSpecial Jungle version of the H&K MP7.\nManufactured by Heckler & Koch, the H&K MP7 is a German submachine gun manufactured to be chambered for 4.6x30mm cartidges. The goal of the design was to meet NATO requirements for a personal defense weapon-class firearm in 1980.

translation.value: Attachment Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: medium This weapon deals increased by 50% damage against cyborgs. Special Jungle version of the Dragunov SR. The legendary semi-automatic sniper rifle designed and developed in the Soviet Union.

original.value: AK-103 City

translation.value: АK-103 Urban

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nSpecial city version of the AK-103.\n The Kalashnikov AK-103 assault rifle is a modification of the current Russian standard issue AK-74M rifle for older 7.62x39mm ammunition. AK-103 is in use by various Russian special Law Enforcement groups, which prefer 7.62mm over 5.45mm for its better stopping power.

translation.value: Attachment Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: medium\nSpecial Urban version of the АK-103.\nThe АK-103 is in use by various Russian special law enforcement groups. They prefer the АK-103 with the 7.62mm over the 5.45mm ammo for its better stopping power.

original.value: Hawk Pump City

translation.value: Hawk Pump Urban

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nSpecial city version of the Hawk Pump.\n Chinese company Hawk Industries produces a line of pump-action shotguns forhunting and security / police purposes, which are based on US-made Remington 870 shotguns.

translation.value: Attachment Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: medium\nSpecial Urban version of the Hawk Pump.\nBased on the Remington Model 870, this line of pump-action shotguns are produced in China for use in hunting and security purposes.

original.value: Kriss super V City

translation.value: Kriss super V Urban

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nSpecial city version of the Kriss super V.\n The TDI Vector series is a family of .45 ACP submachine guns developed by Transformational Defense Industries. They utilize asymmetrical recoil and in-line design to reduce recoil and muzzle climb.

translation.value: Attachment Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: medium\nSpecial Urban version of the Kriss super V.\nThe Axial series utilizes asymmetrical recoil and in-line design to reduce muzzle climb, and is a family of.45 ACP submachine guns.

original.value: SIG 550 City

translation.value: SIG 550 Urban

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium This weapon deal increased damage against cyborgs on 50%. Special city version of the SIG 550. Another member of the SG 550 family is the SG 550 Sniper variant designed specifically for Swiss security forces. This accurized rifle has a refined two-stage trigger.

translation.value: Attachment Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: medium This weapon deals increased by 50% damage against cyborgs. Special Urban version of the SIG 550. The SIG 550 Sniper variant was designed specifically for Swiss security forces. This accurized rifle has a refined two-stage trigger.

original.value: Hawk Pump China set

translation.value: Hawk Pump Desert

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle\n Special China camo version of Hawk Pump. Chinese company Hawk Industries produces a line of pump-action shotguns forhunting and security / police purposes, which are based on US-made Remington 870 shotguns.

original.value: JS 9mm China set

translation.value: JS 9mm Desert

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle\n Special China camo version of The JS 9 mm, which is a commercial export version of the QCW-05 (with the exception of different chambering). It is a suppressed submachine gun developed by the Jianshe Industries (Group) Corporation of Chongqing.

translation.value: Attachment Slots: Scope, Muzzle\nSpecial Desert Camo version of the JS 9mm.\nDeveloped by the Jianshe Industries (Group) Corporation, the JS 9mm is a commercial export version of the QCW-05. The only difference between these two suppressed submachine guns is the chambering, allowing greater stopping power.

original.value: M4A1 U.S. set

translation.value: M4A1 U.S. set

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle\n Special U.S. version of M4A1 which is a family of firearms tracing its lineage back to earlier carbine versions of the M16, all based on the original AR-15 designed by Eugene Stoner and made by ArmaLite.

translation.value: Attachment Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle\nSpecial U.S. version of the M4A1.\nThe M4A1 is based on the original M16 designed by Eugene Stoner and made by ArmaLite. It is a family of firearms and originates back to the AR-15.

original.value: Beretta M9 U.S. set

translation.value: Beretta M9 U.S. set

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Muzzle\n Special U.S. version of Beretta M9. The Beretta M9, formally Pistol, Semi-automatic, 9mm, M9, is a 9x19mm Parabellum pistol of the United States military adopted in 1985. It is basically a military specification Beretta 92F, later the 92FS.

translation.value: Attachment Slots: Muzzle\nSpecial U.S. version of the Beretta M9.\nIn 1985 the U.S. Military adoped the Beretta M9, a 9x19mm Parabellum pistol, into its first military variant 92F, then into the 92FS.

original.value: Remington Model 870 U.S. set

translation.value: Remington Model 870 U.S. set

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nSpecial U.S. version of The Remington Model 870 which is a U.S.-made pump-action shotgun manufactured by Remington Arms Company, Inc. It is widely used by the public for sport shooting, hunting, and self-defense. It is also commonly used by law enforcement and military organizations worldwide.

translation.value: Attachment Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: medium\nSpecial U.S. version of the Remington Model 870.\nThe Remington Model 870 is a U.S. made pump-action shotgun manufactured by the Remington Arms Company, Inc. It is used for sport shooting and hunting as well as by law enforcement and military organizations worldwide.

original.value: M4 CQB U.S. set

translation.value: M4 CQB U.S. set

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle\n Special U.S. version of M4 CQB which is a replacement upper receiver for the M4A1 Carbine. The CQBR replaces the M4 with a barrel 10.3 in (262 mm) length making it the modern equivalent of the Colt Commando short-barrel M16 variants of the past.

translation.value: Attachment Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle\nSpecial U.S. version of the M4 CQB.\nThe M4 CQB is with its 262mm-long barrel is the modern equivalent of iconic Commando variants, and the replacement for the M4A1 Carbine.

original.value: M16 SPR Custom U.S. set

translation.value: M16 SPR Custom U.S. set

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope\nThis weapon deal increased damage against cyborgs on 50%.\nSpecial U.S. version of Special Purpose Rifle (SPR) which is a rifle in service with Special Operations Forces. SPR initially stood for Special Purpose Receiver, but that nomenclature has been replaced as the weapon became a stand-alone weapons system.

translation.value: Attachment Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: medium This weapon deals increased by 50% damage against cyborgs. Special U.S. version of the M16 SPR Custom. As the weapon became a stand-alone weapon system, used by the Special Operation Forces, the nomencalture "Special Purpose Receiver" has been replaced with the name "Special Purpose Rifle", abbreviated with SPR.

original.value: Christmas ACR

translation.value: Christmas ACR

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: High\nSpecial christmas version of ACR.\n The ACR is abbreviation of Advanced Combat Rifle. It was developed by United States Army program to find a replacement for the M16 assault rifle. The program's total cost is approximately $300 million US Dollars.

translation.value: Attachment Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: high\nSpecial christmas version of the ACR.\nThe Advanced Combat Rifle, abbreviated as ACR, was developed by an United States Army program with a $300 million US Dollars development program to find a replacement for the M16 assault rifle.

original.value: Christmas M240B

translation.value: Christmas MG240B

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Low\nThe M240B was the standard infantry medium machine gun of the U.S. Army and is currently standard in the U.S. Marine Corps.

translation.value: Attachment Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: low\nSpecial christmas version of the MG240B.\nThe MG240B was the standard infantry medium machine gun of the U.S. Army and is currently standard in the U.S. Marine Corps.

original.value: Christmas Desert Eagle

translation.value: Christmas Desert Eagle

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nSpecial christmas version of Desert Eagle.\n The Desert Eagle is a large-framed gas-operated semi-automatic pistol designed by Magnum Research in the U.S., and manufactured primarily in Israel by IMI (Israel Military Industries, now Israel Weapon Industries).

translation.value: Attachment Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: medium\nSpecial christmas version of Eagle-Eye.\nThe large-framed, gas-operated semi-automatic pistol Desert Eagle has been designed by Magnum Research in the U.S. and is primarily manufactured by Israel Military Industries.

original.value: Christmas Beretta M9

translation.value: Christmas Beretta M9

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Muzzle. Recoil: Low\nSpecial christmas version of Beretta M9.\nThe Beretta M9, formally Pistol, Semi-automatic, 9mm, M9, is a 9x19mm Parabellum pistol of the United States military adopted in 1985. It is basically a military specification Beretta 92F, later the 92FS.

translation.value: Attachment Slots: Muzzle. Recoil: low\nSpecial christmas version of the Beretta M9.\nIn 1985 the U.S. Military adoped the Beretta M9, a 9x19mm Parabellum pistol, into its first military variant 92F, then into the 92FS.

original.value: Christmas SPAS-12

translation.value: Christmas SPAS-12

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nSpecial christmas version of Spas-12.\n The Spas-12 is a combat shotgun that was manufactured by the Italian firearms company Franchi S.p.A. from 1979 to 2000. The SPAS-12 is a dual-mode shotgun, meaning it can be used as a semi-automatic or pump-action firearm.

translation.value: Attachment Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: medium\nSpecial christmas version of SPAS-12.\nManufactured until the year 2000, the SPAS-12 has been sold to military, police and civilians worldwide.

original.value: Christmas Cobray Striker

translation.value: Christmas Cobray Striker

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nSpecial christmas version of Cobray Striker.\n The Cobray Striker (also known as Sentinel Arms Co Striker-12, Protecta) is a revolver 12-gauge shotgun designed for riot control and combat. It was created in Zimbabwe by Hilton Walker in the early 1980s.

translation.value: Attachment Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: medium\nSpecial christmas version of the Cobray Striker.\nDesigned for riot control and combat, the Cobray Striker is a 12-gauge shotgun that balances stopping power and maneuverability.

original.value: Christmas Kriss super V

translation.value: Christmas Kriss super V

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nSpecial christmas version of Kriss super V.\n The TDI Vector series is a family of .45 ACP submachine guns developed by Transformational Defense Industries. They utilize asymmetrical recoil and in-line design to reduce recoil and muzzle climb.

translation.value: Attachment Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: medium\nSpecial christmas version of the Kriss super V.\nThe Axial series utilizes asymmetrical recoil and in-line design to reduce muzzle climb, and is a family of.45 ACP submachine guns.

original.value: Christmas Daewoo K1

translation.value: Christmas Daewoo K1

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Low\nSpecial christmas version of Deawoo K1.\n The Daewoo K1/K1A assault carbine is the first modern firearm developed by Agency of Defense Development (ADD) and manufactured by S&T Daewoo, and entered service in Republic of Korea Armed Forces in 1981.

translation.value: Attachment Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: low\nSpecial christmas version of the Daewoo K1.\nFirst used in the Republic of Korea Armed Forces in 1981, the Daewoo K1/1A assault carbine is the first modern firearm developed by the Agency of Defense Development, manufactured by S&T Daewoo.

original.value: Christmas Alpine

translation.value: Christmas Alpine

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: High\nSpecial christmas version of Alpine TPG-1.\n Unique Alpine TPG-1 rifle is manufactured in Austria by the Unique Alpine AG. TPG-1 is a modular, high precision rifle which can be used for special military and law enforcement applications.

translation.value: Attachment Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: high\nSpecial christmas version of Alpine.\nThe Unique Alpine sniper rifle is manufactured in Austria by the Unique Alpine AG. The Alpine is a modular, high precision rifle which can be used for special military and law enforcement applications.

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Muzzle. Recoil: High -This weapon does increased damage to cyborgs. -Magazine capacity increased. -Increased ammunition amount. Dreadful version of the Stechkin APS. The Stechkin APS (Avtomaticheskiy Pistolet Stetchkina) is a Russian selective fire machine pistol. It bears the name of its developer, Igor Stechkin. Pistol was intended as a sidearm for artillery soldiers, tank crews and aircraft personnel.

translation.value: Attachment Slots: Muzzle. Recoil: high\nSpecial Mischief version of the Stechkin APS.\nThis weapon has a +200% damage buff against Cyborgs, increased clip capacity and an increased amount of total ammunition.

Dreadful version of the SPAS-12. The Spas-12 is a combat shotgun that was manufactured by the Italian firearms company Franchi S.p.A. from 1979 to 2000. The SPAS-12 is a dual-mode shotgun, meaning it can be used as a semi-automatic or pump-action firearm.

translation.value: Attachment Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: medium\nSpecial Mischief version of the SPAS-12.\nThis weapon has a +200% damage buff against Cyborgs, increased clip capacity and an increased amount of total ammunition.

It has become a popular weapon among Counter-Terrorism Units all around the world.

translation.value: Attachment Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: low\nSpecial Mischief version of the H&K G36C.\nThis weapon has a +200% damage buff against Cyborgs, increased clip capacity and an increased amount of total ammunition.

original.value: AK-103 Basic

translation.value: Urban Warfare АK-103

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: High\nSpecial basic version of the AK-103.\n The Kalashnikov AK-103 assault rifle is a modification of the current Russian standard issue AK-74M rifle for older 7.62x39mm ammunition. AK-103 is in use by various Russian special Law Enforcement groups, which prefer 7.62mm over 5.45mm for its better stopping power.

translation.value: Attachment Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: high\nUrban Warfare version of the АK-103.\nThis variant of the AK-74M rifle is in use by various Russian special law enforcement groups. They prefer the АK-103 with the 7.62mm over the 5.45mm ammo for its better stopping power.

original.value: RPK Basic

translation.value: Urban Warfare RPK

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: High\nSpecial basic version of the RPK.\n The RPK (Ruchnoy Pulemyot Kalashnikova) is a 7.62x39mm light machine gun of Soviet design, developed by Mikhail Kalashnikov in the late 1950s, parallel with the AKM assault rifle. It was created as part of a program designed to standardize the small arms inventory of the Red Army.

translation.value: Attachment Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: high\nUrban Warfare version of the RPK.\nThe RPK is a 7.62x39mm light machine gun of Soviet design. It was created as part of a program designed to standardize the small arms inventory of the Red Army.

original.value: Kriss super V Basic

translation.value: Urban Warfare Kriss super V

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nSpecial basic version of the Kriss super V.\n The TDI Vector series is a family of .45 ACP submachine guns developed by Transformational Defense Industries. They utilize asymmetrical recoil and in-line design to reduce recoil and muzzle climb.

translation.value: Attachment Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: medium\nUrban Warfare version of the Kriss super V.\nThe Axial series utilizes asymmetrical recoil and in-line design to reduce muzzle climb, and is a family of.45 ACP submachine guns.

original.value: AK-9 Basic

translation.value: Urban Warfare AK-9

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nSpecial basic version of the AK-9.\n The AK-9 is based on the so-called "hundred series" of Kalashnikov assault rifles, such as AK-104. It's especially effective with 9x39 subsonic ammunition. Magazine is made of black polymer, holds 20 rounds of ammunition.

translation.value: Attachment Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: medium\nUrban Warfare version of the AK-9.\nLike the AK-104, the AK-9 is based on the so-called "hundred series" of the AK variants. With its 9x39mm subsonic ammunition, it is especially effective, and each of the black polymer magazines holds 20 rounds of ammunition.

original.value: VEPR Basic

translation.value: Urban Warfare VEPR

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nSpecial basic version of the Vepr 12.\n The Vepr 12 is produced by "Molot" factory, which also makes RPK-74 machine guns and Vepr brand semi-automatic hunting rifles. All "Vepr" brand rifles and shotguns are broadly based on the RPK-74 light machinegun designs, adapted for civilian purpose and appropriate ammunition.

translation.value: Attachment Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: medium\nUrban Warfare version of the VEPR.\nThe VEPR is produced by "Molot" factory, which also makes RPK-74 and VEPR brand semi-automatic hunting rifles. All "VEPR" brand rifles and shotguns are broadly based on the RPK designs, adapted for civilian purposes and appropriate ammunition.

original.value: Cobray Striker Basic

translation.value: Urban Warfare Cobray Striker

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nSpecial basic version of the Cobray Striker.\n The Cobray Striker (also known as Sentinel Arms Co Striker-12, Protecta) is a revolver 12-gauge shotgun designed for riot control and combat. It was created in Zimbabwe by Hilton Walker in the early 1980s.

translation.value: Attachment Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: medium\nUrban Warfare version of the Cobray Striker.\nDesigned for riot control and combat, the Cobray Striker is a 12-gauge shotgun that balances stopping power and maneuverability.

original.value: VSS Vintorez Basic

translation.value: Urban Warfare VSS Vintorez

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Rail. Recoil: Low This weapon deal increased damage against cyborgs on 50%. Special basic version of the VSS "Vintorez". The VSS "Vintorez" (thread cutter), is an undercover semi-automatic sniper rifle . The operating principle and sound suppression system are derived from the Val rifle.

translation.value: Attachment Slots: Scope, Rail. Recoil: low This weapon deals increased by 50% damage against cyborgs. Urban Warfare version of the VSS Vintorez. The VSS Vintorez is an undercover semi-automatic sniper rifle. The operating principle and suppression system are derived from the FLA Rifle.

original.value: AWM Basic

translation.value: Urban Warfare AWM

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: High This weapon deal increased damage against cyborgs on 200%. Special basic version of the AVM. The AWM (Arctic Warfare Magnum) is a sniper rifle manufactured by Accuracy International. The AWM features a detachable box magazine which holds five rounds.

translation.value: Attachment Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: medium This weapon deals increased by 200% damage against cyborgs. Urban Warfare version of the AWM. Manufactured by Accuracy International, the AWM (Arctic Warfare Magnum) is a sniper rifle with a detachable 5-round box magazine, and was the first of the "sniper-only" designs ever made.

original.value: M4A1 Basic

translation.value: Urban Warfare M4A1

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Low\nSpecial basic version of the M4A1.\n The M4A1 is a family of firearms tracing its lineage back to earlier carbine versions of the M16, all based on the original AR-15 designed by Eugene Stoner and made by ArmaLite.

translation.value: Attachment Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: low\nUrban Warfare version of the M4A1.\nThe M4A1 is based on the original M16 designed by Eugene Stoner and made by ArmaLite. It is a family of firearms and originates back to the AR-15.

original.value: Daewoo K2 Korea Anniversary

translation.value: Daewoo K2 Korea Anniversary

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle\nSpecial Korea Anniversary version of Daewoo K2.\n The K2 is an assault rifle of the Republic of Korea Armed Forces, manufactured by S&T Daewoo. It is a shoulder-fired, gas-operated, selective-fire assault rifle that feeds from a 20 or 30 round magazine and is chambered for 5.56 NATO.

translation.value: Attachment Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle\nSpecial Korea Anniversary version of the Daewoo K2.\nThe K2 is an assault rifle of the Manufactured by S&T Daewoo, the Daewoo K2 is the primary assault Rifle of the Korean Armed Forces. This selective-fire assault rifle feeds from a 20 or 30 round magazine, is gas-powered and shoulder-fired.

original.value: Daewoo K5 Korea Anniversary

translation.value: Daewoo K5 Korea Anniversary

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Muzzle\nSpecial Korea Anniversary version of Daewoo K5.\n The Daewoo K5 is a 9 mm semi-automatic pistol produced by S&T Daewoo of South Korea. It is a compact, lightweight pistol with an unconventional trigger mechanism called "fast action". The frame is composed of an aluminum alloy with a matte finish, while the slide is of blued steel.

translation.value: Attachment Slots: Muzzle\nSpecial Korea Anniversary version of the Daewoo K5.\nThe Daewoo K5 is a compact 9 mm semi-automatic pistol produced by S&T Daewoo of South Korea. It is a lightweight pistol with an unconventional "fast action" trigger mechanism.

original.value: USAS-12 Korea Anniversary

translation.value: USAS-12 Korea Anniversary

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle\nSpecial Korea Anniversary version of USAS-12.\n The Daewoo Precision Industries USAS-12 is an automatic shotgun designed as a combat shotgun manufactured in South Korea by Daewoo Precision Industries during the 1980s.

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope\nSpecial Korea Anniversary version of Daewoo K7.\n The Daewoo Precision Industries K7 was announced in 2003 as a 9 mm suppressed submachine gun (with permanent suppressor) for use with the South-Korean special forces. original.value: M32A1 Multi Grenade Launcher \n The M32A1 MGL is a multiple-shot weapon, intended to significantly increase a small squad's firepower when compared to traditional single-shot grenade launchers. The MGL is designed to be simple, rugged, and reliable.\n It uses the well-proven revolver principle to achieve a high rate of accurate fire which can be rapidly brought to bear on a target. A variety of rounds such as HE, HEAT, anti-riot baton, irritant, and pyrotechnic can be loaded and fired as fast as the trigger can be pulled; the cylinder can be loaded or unloaded rapidly to maintain a high rate of fire..

translation.value: M32A1 Grenade Launcher\nThe M32A1 Greande Launcher provides its user an increased firepower in comparison to most other grenade launchers, since it can hold 6 rounds instead of one.

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle Special developed for Spec Ops Squads. This weapon provides increased clip capacity, increased amount of ammo and increased damage. The RPK (Ruchnoy Pulemyot Kalashnikova) is a 7.62x39mm light machine gun of Soviet design, developed by Mikhail Kalashnikov in the late 1950s, parallel with the AKM assault rifle. It was created as part of a program designed to standardize the small arms inventory of the Red Army.

translation.value: Attachment Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle Specially developed for Spec Ops Squads. This weapon provides increased clip capacity, increased amount of ammo and increased damage. The RPK has been created as part of a program to standarize the Red Army´s inventory. It is a 7.62x39mm light machine gun of iconic Soviet design.

The weapon's design is derived from the World War II era MG 42 universal machine gun that fired the 7.92x57mm Mauser round.

translation.value: Attachment Slots: Rail, Scope Specially developed for Spec Ops Squads. This weapon provides increased clip capacity, increased amount of ammo and increased damage. The F2000 made its debut in March 2001 at the IDEX defense exhibition held in Abu Dhabi, in the United Arab Emirates.

translation.value: Attachment Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle\nElite Black Dragon version of the FN F2000.\nThe FN F2000 is a NATO bullpup assault rifle. With a futuristic design to ease the carrying and firing of the weapon, its bulky shape also renders the weapon resilient against extreme conditions.

translation.value: Attachment Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle\nElite Jade Dragon version of the M4 CQB.\nThe M4 CQB with its 262mm-long barrel is the modern equivalent of iconic Commando variants, and the replacement for the M4A1 Carbine.

original.value: FN F2000 Scarlet Dragon

translation.value: FN F2000 Scarlet Dragon

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle\n Scarlet Dragon version of the FN F2000.\n The FN F2000 is a 5.56x45mm NATO bullpup assault rifle, designed by FN Herstal in Belgium. The F2000 made its debut in March 2001 at the IDEX defense exhibition held in Abu Dhabi, in the United Arab Emirates.

translation.value: Attachment Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle\nElite Scarlet Dragon version of the FN F2000.\nThe FN F2000 is a NATO bullpup assault rifle. With a futuristic design to ease the carrying and firing of the weapon, its bulky shape also renders the weapon resilient against extreme conditions.

original.value: Jackhammer Scarlet Dragon

translation.value: Jackhammer Scarlet Dragon

original.value: Attachment's Slots: none\n Scarlet Dragon version of the Jackhammer.\n The Pancor Corporation Jackhammer is a 12-gauge, gas-operated automatic shotgun. It is one of very few fully automatic shotguns, and although patented in 1987, it never entered full-scale production.

translation.value: Attachment Slots: none\nElite Scarlet Dragon version of the Jackhammer.\nThe Jackhammer is one of the very few fully 12-gauge, gas-operated automatic shotguns. Patented in 1987, it never entered full-scale production.

original.value: CheyTac M200 Scarlet Dragon

translation.value: CheyTac M200 Scarlet Dragon

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope\n Scarlet Dragon version of the CheyTac M200.\n The CheyTac Intervention is an American bolt action sniper rifle manufactured by CheyTac LLC for long range soft target interdiction. It is fed by a detachable single stack magazine, which holds 7 rounds. CheyTac one of the longest ranges of all modern-day sniper rifles.

translation.value: Attachment Slots: Scope\nElite Scarlet Dragon version of the CheyTac M200.\nFed from a detachable single stack magazine holding 7 rounds, the CheyTac M200 covers ranges unequalled by most modern-day sniper rifles. It is a bolt-action sniper rifle for long-range combat, manufactured in America.

original.value: Mateba Autorevolver Scarlet Dragon

translation.value: Mateba Autorevolver Scarlet Dragon

It was developed in Italy and sold by the Mateba company.

original.value: Pinkie-Micro Desert Eagle

Attachment's Slots: Muzzle. Recoil: Medium Oh my God !! What a nice little handgun! So cute ... Sharing all the family traits of the world-famous Desert Eagle pistol, Magnum’s Micro Desert Eagle pistol, chambered in .380 ACP, is the ultimate in compact personal protection. Small enough to nest comfortably at home, in a pocket or in a purse, the double action only Micro Desert Eagle is proudly made in the U.S. and weighs less than 14 oz. But don’t let its size fool you. The Micro Desert Eagle provides big-time protection with a gas-assisted blowback system for ultimate reliability and amazing accuracy. Which only goes to prove that good things do indeed come in small packages.

translation.value: Attachment Slots: Muzzle OMG - What a sweet handgun! So cute... Sharing the same DNA of the world-famous Desert Eagle pistol, the Micro Desert Eagle pistol, featuring a.380 ACP chamber, is the ultimate accessory in compact personal protection. Small enough to nestle discreetly in a pocket or a purse, the double action Micro Desert Eagle is proudly made in the U.S.A. and weighs less than 14 oz. But don't let its size fool you. The Micro Desert Eagle provides big-time protection with a gas-assisted blowback system for reliability and excellent accuracy - good things do indeed come in small packages.
