original.value: M16A3 Custom EURO 2016

translation.value: M16A3 Fiesta

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: High Special EURO 2016 camouflage version of the M16A3. Football is life…Get in the Game! The M16A3 Custom, now standard issue for front-line U.S. Marine Corps and some U.S. Army units, replaces the combination fixed carry handle/rear iron sight with a MIL-STD-1913 Picatinny rail, allowing for the rifle to be equipped with a carry handle and/or most military and consumer scopes or sighting systems.

translation.value: Attachment Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: high\nSpecial Football Fiesta version of the M16A3.\nThe M16A3 is now the standard issue for front-line U.S. Marine Corps and some U.S. Army units. It has replaced the fixed carry-handle / rear iron sight with a rail, which allows the rifle to be equipped with a carry handle and/or most military and consumer scopes or sighting systems.

original.value: Honey Badger EURO CUP

translation.value: Honey Badger Fiesta

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Rail. Recoil: High Special EURO 2016 camouflage version of the Honey Badger. Football is life…Get in the Game! The AAC Honey Badger PDW is an special PDW weapon based on the AR-15.Have integrated customized sub-sonic silencer. It created for special AAC 300 Blackout ammo caliber. Produced by Advanced Armament Corporation as replacement for HK MP5 and similar CQB weapon systems. Have integrated customized silencer.

translation.value: Attachment Slots: Scope, Rail. Recoil: high\nSpecial Football Fiesta version of the Honey Badger \nThe Honey Badger is an special PDW weapon with an integrated customized silencer. It was created for special sub-sonic ACR caliber ammo. It was produced as a replacement for the H&K MP5 and similar CQB weapon systems.

This machine pistol-class firearm has a lever-type fire-control selector. With the selector lever in the bottom position, the pistol will shoot fully automatic. The firearm is typically used with an extended 33-round capacity magazine.

original.value: AK-103 Evil Santa

translation.value: АK-103 Evil Santa

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nEvil Santa version of the AK-103. \n The Kalashnikov AK-103 assault rifle is a modification of the current Russian standard issue AK-74M rifle for older 7.62x39mm ammunition. AK-103 is in use by various Russian special Law Enforcement groups, which prefer 7.62mm over 5.45mm for its better stopping power.

translation.value: Attachment Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: medium\nEvil Santa version of the АK-103.\nThis variant of the AK-74M rifle is in use by various Russian special law enforcement groups. They prefer the АK-103's 7.62mm ammo over the 5.45mm alternative thanks to its better stopping power.

original.value: FN Five-seveN Evil Santa

translation.value: FN Five-seveN Evil Santa

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nEvil Santa version of the FN Five-seveN. \n The FN Five-seven, trademarked as the Five-seveN, is a semi-automatic pistol designed and manufactured by FN Herstal in Belgium. The pistol is named for its 5.7-mm (.224 in) bullet diameter, and the trademark capitalization style is intended to emphasize the manufacturer's initials—FN (Fabrique Nationale of Herstal).

translation.value: Attachment Slots: Muzzle. Recoil: medium\nEvil Santa version of the FN Five-seveN. \nThis semi-automatic pistol is named after it's 5.7mm (.244in) bullet diameter.

original.value: Benelli M4 Super 90 Evil Santa

translation.value: Benelli M4 Super 90 Evil Santa

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nEvil Santa version of the Benelli M4 Super 90. \n The Benelli M4 Super 90 is a recoil-operated, semi-automatic anti-materiel rifle developed by the American Barrett Firearms Manufacturing company. A heavy SASR (Application Scoped Rifle), it is used by many units and armies around the world. It is also called the "Light Fifty" for its .50 BMG (12.7×99mm NATO) chambering.

translation.value: Attachment Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: medium\nEvil Santa version of the Benelli M4 Super 90. \nThis shotgun, manufactured by Benelli Armi SpA in Italy, is semi-automatic, gas-operated, and holds 12 calibre ammunition.

original.value: PP-19 Bizon Evil Santa

translation.value: PP-19 Bizon Evil Santa

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium Evil Santa version of the PP-19 Bizon. PP-19 Bizon 9x19mm was developed at the request of the Russian Ministry of Internal Affairs by team of engineers headed by Victor Kalashnikov (son of famed AK-47 designer Mikhail Kalashnikov). It's primarily intended for counter-terrorist and law enforcement units that usually need fast and accurate fire at close ranges. One of the Bizon's more unusual features is the magazine, which is often confused for a grenade launcher. The cylinder below the barrel is in fact a 64-round helical-feed magazine, similar to the type used in the American Calico.

translation.value: Attachment Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: medium\nEvil Santa version of the PP-19 Bizon.\nIntended for counter-terrorist and law enforcement units as a weapon with fast and accurate fire at close range, the Russian Ministry of Internal Affairs requested the development of this weapon from the son of the famous weapon developer Kalashnikov. The cylinder below the barrel is often confused as a grenade launcher, but is in fact a helical feed magazine.

original.value: AMP DSR-1 Evil Santa

translation.value: AMP DSR-1 Evil Santa

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: High\nEvil Santa version of the AMP DSR-1. \n The DSR-1 is a compact bolt-action rifle designed, manufactured and marketed by the German company DSR-Precision GmbH and was (until 2004) marketed also by the German company AMP Technical Services as a specialized sniper rifle for police sharpshooters. It has been adopted by the German GSG 9 counter-terrorist unit, as well as by other European special police units and agencies.

translation.value: Attachment Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: high\nEvil Santa version of the AMP DSR-1. \nThis specialized sniper rifle is used by special police units and agencies all over Europe. It is best known for its use by the German counter-terrorist unit, GSG 9. Pierces protective vests with a single hit.

original.value: ATLAS PM-84 Glauberyt Custom

translation.value: ATLAS PM-84 Glauberyt Custom

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Low\n"ATLAS" version of PM-84 Glauberyt Custom\n The PM-84 Glauberyt Custom is a 4-burst round Polish submachine gun. It features a compact design, very good accuracy, high cyclic rate of fire and high damage. These characteristics provide the best way to make easiest one burst kill into upper-body and even hands.

translation.value: Attachment Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: low\n"ATLAS" version of the PM-84 Glauberyt Custom\nThe PM-84 Glauberyt Custom is a 4-burst round Polish submachine gun. It features a compact design, very good accuracy, a high cyclic rate of fire, and inflicts high damage. These characteristics all make this weapon ideal for one burst kill shots to the torso and enhance stability.

original.value: ATLAS M40A5

translation.value: ATLAS M40A5

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Low\n"ATLAS" version of M40A5\n This heavy bolt-action sniper rifle was based on the Remington 700 Short Action with .308 bolt face. It widely used by US Marine Corps because of high power, long range and high-capacity magazine.

translation.value: Attachment Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: low\n"ATLAS" version of the M40A5\nThis heavy bolt-action sniper rifle is widely used by Marines for its high power, its long range and its high-capacity magazine.

original.value: ATLAS M1911A1

translation.value: ATLAS M1911A1

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\n"ATLAS" version of M1911A1\n The M1911 is a single-action, semi-automatic, magazine-fed, recoil-operated pistol chambered for the .45 ACP cartridge, which served as the standard-issue sidearm for the United States armed forces from 1911 to 1985. It was first used in later stages of the Philippine-American War, and was widely used in World War I, World War II, the Korean War, and the Vietnam War. The improved design was adopted by US Military as M1911A1 pistol, and served with distinction until the mid-1980s.

translation.value: Attachment Slots: Muzzle\n"ATLAS" version of the M1911A1\nThe M1911A1 served as a standard-issue sidearm for the United States armed forces in World War I, World War II, the Korean War and the Vietnam War. An improved design was adopted by the US Military and served with distinction until the mid-1980s.

original.value: ATLAS Jagdkommando

translation.value: ATLAS Jagdkommando

original.value: "ATLAS" version of Jagdkommando\n Jagdkommando is a unique knife that has been milled from a solid piece of stainless steel.Named after the Austrian Armed Special Forces Operation group, the Jagdkommando lives up to its elite namesake.The blade's three sharpened edges twist as they come to a point while the grooved faces feature drilled holes that flow seamlessly together.

translation.value: "ATLAS" version of the Jagdkommando\nThe Jagdkommando is a unique knife that has been milled from a solid piece of stainless steel. The blade's three sharpened edges twist as they come to a point while the grooved faces feature drilled holes that flow seamlessly together.

original.value: ATLAS M249 Para

translation.value: ATLAS M249 Para

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\n"ATLAS" version of M249 Para\n It's gas operated and air cooled. It has a quick-change barrel, allowing the gunner to rapidly replace an overheated or jammed barrel. A folding bipod is attached near the front of the gun, though an M192 LGM tripod is also available.

translation.value: Attachment Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: medium\n"ATLAS" version of the M249 Para\nThe M249 is an air-cooled and gas-operated machine gun. Its quick-change barrel allows the gunner to quickly replace overheated or jammed barrels.

original.value: ATLAS MAG-7

translation.value: ATLAS MAG-7

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Low\n"ATLAS" version of MAG-7\n The MAG-7 was developed as a close quarters combat weapon, which would combine the aspects of a compact submachine gun and a pump-action shotgun.

translation.value: Attachment Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: low\n"ATLAS" version of the MAG-7\nThe MAG-7 was developed as a close-quarter combat weapon, combining the features of a compact submachine gun and a pump-action shotgun.

original.value: ATLAS Magpul FMG-9

translation.value: ATLAS Magpul FMG-9

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Low\n"ATLAS" version of Magpul FMG-9\n The Magpul FMG-9 is a prototype for a new generation of folding submachine guns, designed by Magpul Industries in 2008. It has detachable iron sigh with very fast zoom in and insanely high rate of fire. These features make this submachine gun incredibly dangerous at close quarters.

translation.value: Attachment Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: low\n"ATLAS" version of the Magpul FMG-9\nThe Magpul FMG-9 is a prototype for a new generation of folding sub-machine guns. It boasts a detachable iron sight with rapid zoom and an insanely high rate of fire, features which make this sub-machine gun incredibly dangerous at close quarters.

original.value: ATLAS Dragunov SVU-AS

translation.value: ATLAS Dragunov SVU-AS

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope. Recoil: Low This weapon deal increased damage against cyborgs on 50%. "ATLAS" version of Dragunov SVU-AS The OTs-03 SVU aka Sniper Rifle Shortened is a bullpup configuration of the SVD sniper rifle. The SVU was developed to meet the needs of the security forces of the Russian Ministry of Internal Affairs, such as OMON. A special muzzle brake was added that could absorb up to 40% of the recoil energy and an elastic butt stock with lamellar spring was non-rigidly attached to the receiver. The acoustics of the rifle were also improved by adding a sound suppressor. The other main improvements made to the SVU over the SVD include replacement of the butt stock, pistol grip, trigger and the mounting for the sight; and shortening the barrel by 100 mm achieved perfect balance for the weapon.

translation.value: Attachment Slots: Rail, Scope. Recoil: low This weapon deals increased by 50% damage against cyborgs. "ATLAS" version of the Dragunov SVU-AS The Dragunov SVU-AS is inspired by the AST-41 Dragunov SR, based on the SVT, which was developed to meet the needs of the security forces of the Russian Ministry of Internal Affairs. A special muzzle brake absorbing up to 40% of the recoil was added, and an elastic butt stock with lamellar spring was non-rigidly attached to the receiver. The acoustics of the rifle were also improved by adding a sound suppressor. It also features an upgraded butt stock, pistol grip, trigger and mount for a sight. Finally, shortening the barrel by 100 mm ensured its perfect balance.

original.value: ATLAS CZ 75-Auto

translation.value: ATLAS CZ 75-Auto

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Muzzle. Recoil: Low\n"ATLAS" version of CZ 75-Auto\n The CZ 75 is a pistol made by (CZUB) in the Czech Republic that has both semi-automatic and selective fire variants. First introduced in 1975, it is one of the original "wonder nines" featuring a staggered-column magazine, all-steel construction, and a hammer forged barrel. It is widely distributed throughout the world.

translation.value: Attachment Slots: Muzzle. Recoil: low\n"ATLAS" version of the CZ 75-Auto\nMade in the Czech Republic, the CZ 75-Auto is a selective-fire pistol that has both semi-automatic and automatic modes. Introduced back in 1986, it features a double-stack magazine, all-steel construction, and a hammer-forged barrel.

original.value: ATLAS Tactical Axe

translation.value: ATLAS Tactical Axe

original.value: "ATLAS" version of Tactical Axe\n Tactical Axe often used in both ways as a tool and good melee weapon. That is why Tactical Axe has become increasingly popular recently in both the law enforcement and active duty military community. Tactical Axe often used in both ways as a tool and good melee weapon.

translation.value: "ATLAS" version of the Tactical Axe\nThe Tactical Axe can be used both as a tool and as a quality melee weapon, which explains why it has become increasingly popular recently in both the law enforcement and active duty military communities.

It is a shoulder-fired, gas-operated, selective-fire assault rifle that feeds from a 20 or 30 round magazine and is chambered for 5.56 NATO.

It is a shoulder-fired, gas-operated, selective-fire assault rifle that feeds from a 20 or 30 round magazine and is chambered for 5.56 NATO.

MSBS stands for “Modułowy Systema Broni Strzeleckiej” – modular small arms system.

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium "Anubis" version of PP-19 Bizon PP-19 Bizon 9x19mm was developed at the request of the Russian Ministry of Internal Affairs by team of engineers headed by Victor Kalashnikov (son of famed AK-47 designer Mikhail Kalashnikov). It's primarily intended for counter-terrorist and law enforcement units that usually need fast and accurate fire at close ranges. One of the Bizon's more unusual features is the magazine, which is often confused for a grenade launcher. The cylinder below the barrel is in fact a 64-round helical-feed magazine, similar to the type used in the American Calico.

translation.value: Attachment slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: medium\n"Anubis" version of the PP-19 Bizon\nThe Russian Ministry of Internal Affairs commissioned the son of the famous weapon developer Kalashnikov to develop this weapon – intended for counter-terrorist and law enforcement units as a weapon with fast and accurate fire at close range. The cylinder below the barrel is often mistaken for a grenade launcher, but it is in fact a helical feed magazine.

The weapon's unique features include comfortable recoil, high rate of fire and heavy-piercing bullet with additional damage to limbs and additional damage at long ranges.

It has great damage, high firing range and good accuracy. It has integral folding bipod which improves stability and long-range accuracy in prone position.

original.value: Radiation MAG-7

translation.value: MAG-7 "Nuclear"

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Low\nSpecial "Radiation" version of MAG-7.\nThe MAG-7 was developed as a close quarters combat weapon, which would combine the aspects of a compact submachine gun and a pump-action shotgun.

translation.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: low\nSpecial "Nuclear" version of MAG-7.\nThe uniquely styled MAG-7 sacrifices some power in comparison to the popular Fabarm ATF-12, but more than makes up for it with a longer range and faster RPM. In short, when the time comes to get up close and personal on the battlefield, the MAG-7 won’t let you down.

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope. Recoil: Low\nSpecial "Radiation" version of DP-12.\nThe DP-12 double barrel pump is like no shotgun that you have ever seen before. The one of a kind shotgun not only supports two magazine tubes but two barrels that do double damage!

translation.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope. Recoil: low\nSpecial "Nuclear" version of DP-12.\nWith its double barrel pump action, the DP-12 is like no other shotgun. This one-of-a-kind shotgun not only supports two magazines but also boasts two barrels that do double the damage!

original.value: Radiation M1911A1

translation.value: M1911A1 "Nuclear"

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nSpecial "Radiation" version of M1911A1.\nThe M1911 is a single-action, semi-automatic, magazine-fed, recoil-operated pistol chambered for the .45 ACP cartridge, which served as the standard-issue sidearm for the United States armed forces from 1911 to 1985. It was first used in later stages of the Philippine-American War, and was widely used in World War I, World War II, the Korean War, and the Vietnam War. The improved design was adopted by US Military as M1911A1 pistol, and served with distinction until the mid-1980s,

translation.value: Attachment's Slots: Muzzle\nSpecial "Nuclear" version of M1911A1.\nThe M1911A1 served as a standard-issue sidearm for the United States armed forces in World War I, World War II, the Korean War and the Vietnam War. An improved design was adopted by the US Military and served with distinction until the mid-1980s.

original.value: Xmas Rhino 60DS

translation.value: Rhino 60 DS "Radiance"

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Low\nSpecial Xmas 2017 skin of Rhino 60DS.\nThe Chiappa Rhino is a revolver produced by Chiappa Firearms of Italy.The new Chiappa Rhino has revolutionized the revolver with a patented design that tames the prehistoric characteristic that most revolvers possess. It is aligned with the bottom most chamber which is the key component to Rhino's tame characteristics. The position of the barrel lowers the center of gravity and yields a centerline of the bore more in line with the shooter's arm allowing for the most natural "point ability" while engaging a target. This characteristic also drastically reduces both recoil and muzzle flip which insures subsequent shots to be on target faster than ever before.

translation.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: low\nSpecial Xmas skin of Rhino 60 DS.\nWith its patented design, the Rhino 60 DS has revolutionized the revolver. With the bottom most chamber it tames the prehistoric characteristics that most revolvers possess. So the center of gravity gets lowered and this reduces the the recoil and the muzzle flip.

AK Alpha

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nThe AK-Alfa is a revolutionary approach to weapons upgrades. A handpicked team of snipers and engineers from the IDF Special Forces designed the Alfa rifle to allow the shooter to maximize his shooting abilities, with the most reliable weapon on the planet. An iconic firearms platform now reborn as the new Israeli Kalashnikov to be the apex of technology. The weapon's unique features include comfortable recoil, high rate of fire and heavy-piercing bullet with additional damage to limbs and additional damage at long ranges. AK-Alpha staffed with Tactical Silencer, AK-Alpha suppressor, Tactical Grip, Sig Sauer Romeo 4 RDS and Hartman MH1 RDS.

translation.value: Attachment Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: medium\nThe AK Alpha is a revolutionary approach to weapons upgrades. A handpicked team of expert marksmen and engineers from the IDF Special Forces designed the Alpha rifle to allow the shooter to maximize his shooting abilities, with the most reliable weapon on the planet. An iconic firearms platform now reborn as the new Israeli Kalashnikov to be the apex of technology. The weapon's unique features include comfortable recoil, high rate of fire and heavy-piercing munitions capability with additional damage to limbs and additional damage at long ranges. AK Alpha staffed with Tactical Silencer, AK Alpha suppressor, Tactical Grip, Sig Sauer Romeo 4 RDS and Hartman MH1 RDS.

The AK-Alfa is a revolutionary approach to weapons upgrades. A handpicked team of snipers and engineers from the IDF Special Forces designed the Alfa rifle to allow the shooter to maximize his shooting abilities, with the most reliable weapon on the planet. An iconic firearms platform now reborn as the new Israeli Kalashnikov to be the apex of technology. The weapon's unique features include comfortable recoil, high rate of fire and heavy-piercing bullet with additional damage to limbs and additional damage at long ranges. AK-Alpha staffed with Tactical Silencer, AK-Alpha suppressor, Tactical Grip, Sig Sauer Romeo 4 RDS and Hartman MH1 RDS.

original.value: Gepard GM6 Lynx

translation.value: Gepard GM6 Lynx

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope. Recoil: Medium This weapon deal increased damage against cyborgs on 50%. Has unique attachment Schmidt & Bender v2 4.6x scope. Gepard GM6 Lynx is a Hungarian semi-automatic anti-material rifle, developed in the late 80s. Featuring a bullpup layout and a sliding barrel, it is relatively compact for a weapon with such firepower. The weight distribution of the gun also allows to operate the rifle in off-hand hand position, which is much more difficult when it comes to other high-caliber rifles.

original.value: FN FAL DSA-58

translation.value: FN FAL DSA-58

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nAmerican company DSA (David Selveggio Arms) manufactures a copy of the FAL called the DSA-58 that is made with the same Steyr-Daimler-Puch production line equipment as the StG-58. Civilian models are semi-automatic, but military and Law Enforcement clients can procure select-fire models that have a fully automatic cyclic rate of 620 rounds/minute. This motel has unique comfortable tactical grip with unique features and heavy-piercing ammo with additional damage to limbs and additional damage at long ranges.

translation.value: M48 Bowie Knife \nThe alternate melee attack can even kill an enemy in an Anti-Melee Vest.\nThe modern reiteration of a time-tested Bowie knife, M48 features a strong and sturdy stainless steel blade with serrated sawback and titanium finish. original.value: Remington MSR

translation.value: Remington MSR

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nHas unique attachment Bushnell 4x scope and Remington MSR suppressor.\nRemington MSR is a light aluminium bolt-action sniper rifle developed in late 00s by Remington Arms. MSR stands for Modular Sniper Rifle, as the caliber of the weapon can quickly be changed between .338, .300 and 7.62 via the barrel and bolt swap. This a modern and precise gun, if a bit pricey. US military has already adopted MSR into service, as well as several other countries.

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope . Recoil: Medium\nThe Degtyaryov machine gun is a light machine gun firing the 7.62x54mmR cartridge that was primarily used by the Soviet Union starting in 1928\n The DP-27 was an improvement of the earlier DP-26, both designed by Vasily Degtyaryov. The DP-27 was relatively cheap and easy to manufacture - early models had fewer than 80 parts. The DP was especially able to withstand dirt in a reliable fashion. In tests it was buried in sand and mud and was still capable of firing more than 500 rounds.

translation.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope . Recoil: medium\nDP-27 is a light machine gun chambered in 7.62x54\n Its earlier models consisted of as many as 80 parts. One of the key strengths of this LMG is reliability, as proven by multiple stress tests and time.

The DP-27 was relatively cheap and easy to manufacture - early models had fewer than 80 parts. The DP was especially able to withstand dirt in a reliable fashion. In tests it was buried in sand and mud and was still capable of firing more than 500 rounds.

original.value: Taurus Judge

translation.value: Taurus Judge

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope. Recoil: Medium\nTaurus Judge is an extremely powerful revolver that uses .410 shotgun shells for ammo. Due to the short barrel, the pellet spread is enormous and makes the gun less effective at distance. Point-black, however, the Judge kicks like a horse. Ammunition size and weight limit the cylinder to only 5 rounds.

translation.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope. Recoil: medium\nTaurus Judge is an extremely powerful revolver that uses .410 shotgun shells for ammo. The spread is truly massive, owing to the short barrel, though the gun is extremely potent in close quarters.

original.value: Football 2018 Enfield L85A2 Custom

translation.value: Enfield L85A2 Custom "World Tournament"

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle\nSpecial Football 2018 skin of Enfield L85A2 Custom.\nIt`s a custom 3-burst round British bullpup assault rifle. It has high cyclic rate of fire with minimal recoil. The L85A2 is a revamped version of the L85A1 with improved internal and external components. As a result, these rifles are recognized as reliable, very accurate and easy to use.

translation.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: medium\nSpecial World Tournament version of Enfield L85A2 Custom.\nL85A2 is a British assault rifle capable of firing in 3-round bursts. Among its strenghts are high rate of fire and low recoil.

original.value: Football 2018 Mossberg 500 Custom

translation.value: Mossberg 500 Custom "World Tournament"

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nSpecial Football 2018 skin of Mossberg 500 Custom.\nSpecial custom version of Mossberg 500 with installed: Full Quad Rail System and MagPul MBUS front/rear sight, Angled Fore Grip, Forend, SGA Stock. This improvements allows easily and quickly equip and protect shotgun. Also provides a comfortable and stable user interface that reduces fatigue and allows for more precise weapon control.

translation.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: medium\nSpecial World Tournament version of Mossberg 500 Custom.\nThis modified Mossberg 500 Custom comes with a pre-installed Full Quad Rail System, Angled Fore Grip and Forend, enhancing recoil control and accuracy of the shotgun, as well as making it more ergonimic altogether.

original.value: Football 2018 SCAR-L PDW

translation.value: SCAR-L PDW "World Tournament"

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nSpecial Football 2018 skin of SCAR-L PDW.\nThe FN SCAR PDW is a tailored design to meet the needs of aircraft, watercraft, vehicle operators and personal security details who have confined operational spaces or who have a desire to conceal their weapon. Small sizes combined with high efficiency, high reliability and ease of use.

translation.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: medium\nSpecial World Tournament version of SCAR-L PDW.\nThe SCAR-L PDW meets the needs of air, sea and land vehicle operators and personal security details that have to operate in confined spaces. Its small size combined with high efficiency, reliability and ease of use makes it a killer weapon.

original.value: Football 2018 McMillan CS5

translation.value: McMillan CS5 "World Tournament"

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: High Special Football 2018 skin of McMillan CS5. The McMillan CS5 is designed for stealth and concealment in urban settings. The bolt action CS5 is specifically designed as a compact and concealable precision tactical rifle. It is available in suppressed configuration for military and law enforcement applications, as well as standard configuration.

translation.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: high\nSpecial World Tournament version of McMillan CS5.\nThis compact bolt action sniper rifle has been specifically desinged for covert ops in urban environment. The rifle comes in two configurations: regular is aimed at the civilian marked, whereas law enforcement and armed forces get an enhanced military grade rifle with improved sound suppression.

original.value: Football 2018 CZ 75-Auto

translation.value: CZ 75-Auto "World Tournament"

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Muzzle. Recoil: Low\nSpecial Football 2018 skin of CZ 75-Auto.\nThe CZ 75 is a pistol made by (CZUB) in the Czech Republic that has both semi-automatic and selective fire variants. First introduced in 1975, it is one of the original "wonder nines" featuring a staggered-column magazine, all-steel construction, and a hammer forged barrel. It is widely distributed throughout the world.

translation.value: Attachment's Slots: Muzzle. Recoil: low\nSpecial World Tournament version of CZ 75-Auto.\nThe CZ 75-Auto is a selective-fire pistol made in the Czech Republic. It has both semi-automatic and automatic modes. Introduced back in 1975, this gun features a double-stack magazine, an all-steel construction, and a hammer-forged barrel.

original.value: Football 2018 Jagdkommando

translation.value: Jagdkommando "World Tournament"

original.value: Special Football 2018 skin of Jagdkommando \nJagdkommando is a unique knife that has been milled from a solid piece of stainless steel.Named after the Austrian Armed Special Forces Operation group, the Jagdkommando lives up to its elite namesake.The blade's three sharpened edges twist as they come to a point while the grooved faces feature drilled holes that flow seamlessly together.

translation.value: Special World Tournament version of Jagdkommando \nJagdkommando is a unique knife that has been milled from a solid piece of stainless steel. Named after the Austrian Armed Special Forces Operation group, the Jagdkommando lives up to its elite namesake. The blade's three sharpened edges twist as they come to a single point while the handle is covered with carvings for a better grip.

original.value: Vietnam Tiger IMBEL IA2

translation.value: Tigerstripe IMBEL IA2

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: High\nSpecial "Vietnam Tiger " version of IMBEL IA2. \nThe IA2 assault rifle designed for the Brazilian Armed Forces to replace FN FAL and M16A2. IA2 has long list of pros: universal STANAG magazine, high power, good accuracy on long range, high durability and reliability in extreme conditions.

translation.value: Attachment Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: high\nThe special Tigerstripe version of the IMBEL IA2. \nThe IMBEL IA2 assault rifle was officially deployed in the Brazilian army as a replacement for the outdated FN FAl and M16A2 rifles. Its advantages include the universal STANAG magazine, high power and durability, good accuracy at long ranges and reliability in extreme conditions.

original.value: Vietnam Tiger Beretta ARX160

translation.value: Tigerstripe Beretta ARX160

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nSpecial "Vietnam Tiger" version of Beretta ARX160.\nThe Beretta ARX160 is an assault rifle manufactured by Beretta in 2008. The weapon's unique features include comfortable recoil, high rate of fire and heavy-piercing bullet with additional damage to limbs and additional damage at long ranges.

translation.value: Attachment Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: high\nThe special Tigerstripe version of the Beretta ARX160.\nAn assault rifle developed by the Beretta company in 2008. Stands out for its comfortable recoil, high rate of fire and high piercing capability.

original.value: Vietnam Tiger PKP Pecheneg

translation.value: Tigerstripe PKP Pecheneg

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nSpecial "Vietnam Tiger" version of PKP Pecheneg.\nThe PKP Pecheneg is a Russian machine gun chambered for the 7.62Г—54mm round. It has great damage, high firing range and good accuracy. It has integral folding bipod which improves stability and long-range accuracy in prone position.

translation.value: Attachment Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: medium\nThe special Tigerstripe version of the PKP Pecheneg.\nThe PKP Pecheneg is a Russian machine gun chambered for the 7.62×54mm round. It has high damage and high range. It has an integral folding bipod which assists in long-range fire in the prone position.

original.value: Vietnam Tiger Army Jagdkommando

translation.value: Tigerstripe Jagdkommando Knife

original.value: Special Vietnam Tiger version of Jagdkommando.\nJagdkommando is a unique knife that has been milled from a solid piece of stainless steel.Named after the Austrian Armed Special Forces Operation group, the Jagdkommando lives up to its elite namesake.The blade's three sharpened edges twist as they come to a point while the grooved faces feature drilled holes that flow seamlessly together.

translation.value: The special Tigerstripe version of the Jagdkommando knife. \nA deadly three-bladed knife milled from a solid piece of steel. Named after an Australian special forces squad. Has increased speed and damage.

translation.value: Tigerstripe Mateba Autorevolver

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Muzzle. Recoil: High\nSpecial "Vietnam Tiger" version of Mateba Autorevolver.\nThe Mateba Model 6 Unica (often known simply as the Mateba or the Mateba Autorevolver) is a semi-automatic revolver, one of only a few of this type ever produced. It was developed in Italy and sold by the Mateba company.

translation.value: Attachment Slots: Muzzle. Recoil: high\nThe special Tigerstripe version of the Mateba Autorevolver.\nThe Mateba Model 6 Unica revolver (also known as the Mateba Autorevolver) is a representative of a rare type of automatic revolver. Developed and produced in Italy.

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Muzzle. Recoil: Low\nSpecial "Vietnam Tiger" version of CZ 75-Auto\nThe CZ 75 is a pistol made by (CZUB) in the Czech Republic that has both semi-automatic and selective fire variants. First introduced in 1975, it is one of the original "wonder nines" featuring a staggered-column magazine, all-steel construction, and a hammer forged barrel. It is widely distributed throughout the world.

translation.value: Attachment Slots: Muzzle. Recoil: low\nThe special Tigerstripe version of the CZ 75-Auto.\nA Czech pistol, first presented at an exhibition in Madrid in 1975. Allows you to fire in volleys.

original.value: Vietnam Tiger Fabarm P.S.S.10

translation.value: Tigerstripe Fabarm P.S.S.10

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nSpecial "Vietnam Tiger" version of Fabarm P.S.S.10.\nFabarm P.S.S.10 is a modern semi-automatic shotgun made by Fabarm weapon factory. It has extremely high RPM, great accuracy and smooth recoil.

translation.value: Attachment Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: medium\nThe special Tigerstripe version of the Fabarm P.S.S.10.\nA semi-automatic shotgun developed by the Fabarm company. Excellent rate of fire and low recoil.

original.value: Vietnam Tiger MAG-7

translation.value: Tigerstripe MAG-7

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Low\n"Vietnam Tiger" version of MAG-7\nThe MAG-7 was developed as a close quarters combat weapon, which would combine the aspects of a compact submachine gun and a pump-action shotgun.

translation.value: Attachment Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: low\nThe special Tigerstripe version of the MAG-7.\nA compact pump-action shotgun based on the UZI machine pistol and designed for firing at short range.

original.value: Vietnam Tiger Fabarm S.A.T. 8 Pro

translation.value: Tigerstripe Fabarm S.A.T. 8 Pro

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\n"Vietnam Tiger" version of Fabarm S.A.T. 8 Pro\nFABARM S.A.T. 8 Pro - modern shotgun made by Fabarm weapon factory. S.A.T. means Semi-Automatic Tactical 8. This weapon designed as for law agencies and also for civilian and sport market. Fabarm S.A.T. 8 Pro is high quality, ergonomic and balance gun. It's automatic is less sensitive to dirt and high reliability.

translation.value: Attachment Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: medium\nThe special Tigerstripe version of the Fabarm S.A.T. 8 Pro.\nThe FABARM S.A.T. 8 Pro is a semi-automatic shotgun developed by the Italian company Fabarm. It stands out for its well designed ergonomics and excellent balance. The gun’s automatic mode is less sensitive to dirt, increasing its reliability.

original.value: Vietnam Tiger Tavor CTAR-21

translation.value: Tigerstripe Tavor CTAR-21

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Rail, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nSpecial "Vietnam Tiger" version of Tavor CTAR-21.\nThe Tavor CTAR-21 is a compact short barrel version intended for commandos and special forces. High reliability and accuracy under extreme conditions.

translation.value: Attachment Slots: Scope, Rail, Muzzle. Recoil: medium\nThe special Tigerstripe version of the Tavor CTAR-21.\nA compact machine pistol developed for special forces. Stands out for its high accuracy and reliability even in extreme conditions, along with its unique sight system.

original.value: Vietnam Tiger PP-19 Bizon

translation.value: Tigerstripe PP-19 Bizon

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium Special "Vietnam Tiger" version of PP-19 Bizon PP-19 Bizon 9x19mm was developed at the request of the Russian Ministry of Internal Affairs by team of engineers headed by Victor Kalashnikov (son of famed AK-47 designer Mikhail Kalashnikov). It's primarily intended for counter-terrorist and law enforcement units that usually need fast and accurate fire at close ranges. One of the Bizon's more unusual features is the magazine, which is often confused for a grenade launcher. The cylinder below the barrel is in fact a 64-round helical-feed magazine, similar to the type used in the American Calico.

translation.value: Attachment Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: medium The special Tigerstripe version of the PP-19 Bizon. The Bizon is a machine pistol chambered for 9x19 mm rounds, developed under the leadership of Victor Kalashnikov, the son of the famous designer Mikhail Kalashnikov. One of the outstanding characteristics of the Bizon is its high-capacity helical magazine, which is often confused with a grenade launcher because it is located underneath the barrel.

original.value: Vietnam Tiger CZ Scorpion EVO

translation.value: Tigerstripe CZ Scorpion EVO 3 A1

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: High\nSpecial "Radiation" version of CZ Scorpion EVO.\nCZ Scorpion is the one of the best sub machine guns. EVO features futuristic design, comfort recoil and increased penetrability, high enough to make a hole in any helmet at close range.

translation.value: Attachment Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: high\nThe special Tigerstripe version of the CZ Scorpion EVO 3 A1.\nA Czech machine pistol with a futuristic design and increased penetrative power, allowing you to make a hole in any helmet at short range.

original.value: Vietnam Tiger Desert Tech MDR-C

translation.value: Tigerstripe Desert Tech MDR-C

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nSpecial "Vietnam Tiger" version of Desert Tech MDR-C.\nThe Desert Tech Micro Dynamic Rifle Compact (MDR-C) is a bullpup SMG produced by US-based Desert Tech Inc. Features include: comfort recoil, fast reloading and great damage which provides great penetrability against helmets, even with a silencer.

translation.value: Attachment Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: medium\nThe special Vietnam Tiger version of the Desert Tech MDR-C.\nA bullpup weapon with a short barrel, developed by the DesertTech Inc company. Stands out for its controlled recoil, quick reload and high damage, allowing it to pierce helmets even with a suppressor.

original.value: Vietnam Tiger Calico M951S

translation.value: Tigerstripe Calico M951S

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Low This weapon deal increased damage against cyborgs on 50%. Special "Vietnam Tiger" version of Calico M951S. The Calico M951 is a select fire version of the nearly identical M900 Semi Auto Carbine, except the 951 has a special compensator (much like a mini Cutts Compensator) that is larger than the compensator for the M900.

translation.value: Attachment Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: low This weapon deals increased by 50% damage against cyborgs. The special Tigerstripe version of the Calico M951S. Practically identical to the M900 semiautomatic rifle. The only difference in the 951 model is in its special compensator, which is larger than the M900 compensator.

original.value: Vietnam Tiger M40A5

translation.value: Tigerstripe M40A5

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Low\nSpecial "Vietnam Tiger" version of M40A5\nThis heavy bolt-action sniper rifle was based on the Remington 700 Short Action with .308 bolt face. It widely used by US Marine Corps because of high power, long range and high-capacity magazine.

translation.value: Attachment Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: low\nThe special Tigerstripe version of the M40A5.\nA high-caliber bolt-action sniper rifle. Widely used by the US marine corps thanks to its high firepower and long range.

original.value: Vietnam Tiger AX308

original.value: K.I.W.I. Tactical Axe

translation.value: K.I.W.I. Tactical Axe

original.value: Special "K.I.W.I." version of Tactical Axe\nTactical Axe often used in both ways as a tool and good melee weapon. That is why Tactical Axe has become increasingly popular recently in both the law enforcement and active duty military community. Tactical Axe often used in both ways as a tool and good melee weapon.

translation.value: The special K.I.W.I. version of the Tactical Axe.\nThe Tactical Axe isn’t just a useful tool, it’s also a great weapon for melee against the enemy.

original.value: K.I.W.I. M48 Bowie Knife

translation.value: K.I.W.I. M48 Bowie Knife

original.value: Special "K.I.W.I." version of M48 Bowie Knife \nModern reimagining of a timeless Bowie knife, M48 features a strong and sturdy stainless steel blade with serrated sawback and titanium finish. This weapon will satisfy all your tacticool crawings to the fullest.

translation.value: Special K.I.W.I. version of the M48 Bowie knife.\nThe alternate melee attack can even kill an enemy in an Anti-Melee Vest.\nThe modern reimagining of a timeless Bowie knife, M48 features a strong and sturdy stainless steel blade with serrated sawback and titanium finish. This weapon is designed for those who want to eliminate their enemies unnoticed and look cool doing so.

original.value: K.I.W.I. KABAR Kukri-machete

translation.value: K.I.W.I. KA-BAR Kukri Machete

original.value: Special "K.I.W.I." version of KABAR Kukri-machete \nSurviving the toughest field testing, the Kukri boasts excellent results in chopping and basic field use.

translation.value: The special K.I.W.I. version of the KA-BAR Kukri Machete.\nA perfectly balanced blade that won’t let you down even the most difficult conditions in the field.

original.value: K.I.W.I. VHS-2

translation.value: K.I.W.I. VHS-2

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nSpecial "K.I.W.I." version of VHS-2.\nThe Croatian VHS-2, is an improved version of the VHS rifle which retains its bullpup design, caliber and barrel length, as well as the internal mechanism, but introduces a new, more conventional fire selector. A redesigned carrying handle, an adjustable-length buttstock, and an ambidextrous cartridge casings ejection system that can be configured for either right or left side ejection in less than a minute.

translation.value: Attachment Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: medium\nThe special K.I.W.I. version of the VHS-2\nA Croatian bullpup rifle. Equipped with a carrying handle, an adjustable-length buttstock, and spent shell ejection ports on both sides.

original.value: K.I.W.I. Gepard GM6 Lynx

translation.value: K.I.W.I. Gepard GM6 Lynx

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope. Recoil: Medium This weapon deal increased damage against cyborgs on 50%. Has unique attachment Schmidt & Bender v2 4.6x scope. Special "K.I.W.I." version of Gepard GM6 Lynx. Gepard GM6 Lynx is a Hungarian semi-automatic anti-material rifle, developed in the late 80s. Featuring a bullpup layout and a sliding barrel, it is relatively compact for a weapon with such firepower. The weight distribution of the gun also allows to operate the rifle in off-hand hand position, which is much more difficult when it comes to other high-caliber rifles.

translation.value: Attachment Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: medium This weapon deals increased by 50% damage against cyborgs. Supplied with the Schmidt & Bender v2 (4.6x) sight. The special K.I.W.I. version of the Gepard GM6 Lynx. A Hungarian bullpup sniper rifle. Stands out for its compact size for the caliber. In contrast to other high-caliber rifles, it can be fired reasonably comfortably without using a bipod.

original.value: K.I.W.I. UZI PRO

translation.value: K.I.W.I. Uzi Pro

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Rail, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nSpecial "K.I.W.I." version of UZI PRO.\nUZI PRO SMG is the newest member of the legendary UZI family one of the most popular weapon families in the world, with millions of units sold around the globe. The UZI PRO is an ideal solution for both concealed or openly carried use for law enforcement, VIP protection and Special Forces. It created for special AAC 300 Blackout ammo caliber. Produced by Advanced Armament Corporation as replacement for HK MP5 and similar CQB weapon systems. Have integrated customized silencer.

translation.value: Attachment Slots: Scope, Rail, Muzzle. Recoil: medium\nThe special K.I.W.I. version of the Uzi Pro.\nThe newest model in this family of Israeli machine pistols. The Uzi Pro is perfectly suited both for concealed carry and for use by law enforcement and special forces squads.

original.value: K.I.W.I. MPA 930DMG

translation.value: K.I.W.I. MPA 930DMG

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Low Special "K.I.W.I." version of MPA 930DMG. Have the unique attachment Silencer. The MPA 930DMG is a highly ergonomic modern 9-mm machine pistol that is capable of using standard Glock magazines.

translation.value: Attachment Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: weak The special K.I.W.I. version of the MPA 930DMG Unique attachment: suppressor. An ergonomic and compact 9 mm pistol. Loaded with standard Glock magazines.

original.value: K.I.W.I. Saiga Custom

translation.value: K.I.W.I. H.G.C. Custom

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Low\nSpecial "K.I.W.I." version of Saiga Custom.\nThe Saiga is a Kalashnikov-pattern 12 gauge combat shotgun available in a wide range of configurations. Like the Kalashnikov rifle variants, it is a rotating bolt, gas-operated gun that feeds from a box magazine.

translation.value: Attachment Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: low The special K.I.W.I. version of the H.G.C. Custom. Unique attachment: special tactical suppressor. A 12-gauge hunting carbine based on the Kalashnikov rifle, available in various models. Like the AK, it is gas-operated and uses box magazines.

original.value: K.I.W.I. Fostech Origin-12

translation.value: K.I.W.I. Fostech Origin-12

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nSpecial "K.I.W.I." version of Fostech Origin-12.\nProduced by USA-based manufacturer Fostech Outdoors, Origin-12 is considered to be the fastest semi-automatic shotgun in the world. Mainly used for sports and hunting, it packs a substantial punch and can use drum magazines with up to 30 rounds. Combined with the impressive RPM, it can create a real storm of metal downrange.

translation.value: Attachment Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: medium\nThe special K.I.W.I. version of the Fostech Origin-12.\nA semi-automatic smoothbore shotgun made by Fostech Outdoors, which stands out for its high rate of fire. Primarily used for sports shooting and hunting, but also as a law enforcement weapon.

original.value: K.I.W.I. S&W M&P R8

translation.value: K.I.W.I. S&W M&P R8

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope. Recoil: Medium\nSpecial "K.I.W.I." version of S&W M&P R8.\nIt`s the eight-shot .357 modern tactical revolver, named the Military & Police (M&P) R8, staffed with a Leupold X1.3 DeltaPoint reflex sight. S&W M&P R8 features modern design, high damage and high accuracy.

translation.value: Attachment Slots: Scope. Recoil: medium\nThe special K.I.W.I. version of the S&W M&P R8.\nA modern eight-shot revolver chambered for .357 ammunition. Supplied with the DeltaPoint collimator sight. This weapon stands out for its high accuracy and firepower.

original.value: K.I.W.I. FN FAL DSA 58

translation.value: K.I.W.I. FN FAL DSA-58

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nSpecial "K.I.W.I." version of FN FAL DSA 58.\nAmerican company DSA (David Selveggio Arms) manufactures a copy of the FAL called the DSA-58 that is made with the same Steyr-Daimler-Puch production line equipment as the StG-58. Civilian models are semi-automatic, but military and Law Enforcement clients can procure select-fire models that have a fully automatic cyclic rate of 620 rounds/minute. This motel has unique comfortable tactical grip with unique features and heavy-piercing ammo with additional damage to limbs and additional damage at long ranges.

translation.value: Attachment Slots: Scope, Rail, Muzzle. Recoil: medium\nThe special K.I.W.I. version of the FN FAL DSA-58.\nA modification of the Belgian FN FAL rifle, created by the American company DS Arms. The weapon is supplied with a convenient tactical handle and uses ammunition that deals increased damage to limbs and extra damage at long range.

translation.value: K.I.W.I. Desert Tech MDR-C

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nSpecial "K.I.W.I." version of Desert Tech MDR-C.\nThe Desert Tech Micro Dynamic Rifle Compact (MDR-C) is a bullpup SMG produced by US-based Desert Tech Inc. Features include: comfort recoil, fast reloading and great damage which provides great penetrability against helmets, even with a silencer.

translation.value: Attachment Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: medium\nThe special K.I.W.I. version of the Desert Tech MDR-C.\nA bullpup weapon with a short barrel, developed by the DesertTech Inc company. Stands out for its controlled recoil, quick reload and high damage, allowing it to pierce helmets even with a suppressor.

original.value: TDI KRISS Super V

translation.value: Kriss Super V Custom

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Low\nHas unique attachments KRISS Super V Tactical Grip, KRISS Super V Silencer and Redring MK2 Scope with fast zoom.\nThe Kriss Super V submachine gun was developed by Transformational Defense Industries (TDI). Its name comes from Indonesian sword or large knife. Production of this weapon commenced in 2009. At some point the company became known as Kriss USA and the weapon was rebranded as Vector. TDI Vector or Kriss Super V has excellent accuracy even in continuous fire, making it reliable in various situation. It also comes with an attachable Silencer

original.value: Warfest MP-443 Grach

translation.value: Warfest MP-443 Grach

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope. Recoil: Low\nWarfest version of MP-443 Grach.\nThis handgun was developed under designation "Grach" in response to Russian military trials, which began in 1993. In 2003, it was adopted as a standard sidearm for all branches of Russian military and law enforcement, alongside Makarov PM, GSh-18, and SPS. It is chambered for the high-powered 9x19mm 7N21 cartridge, the Russian version of 9mm NATO, loaded to comparable pressure specifications. The 7N21 features an armour-piercing bullet with a tempered steel core.

translation.value: Warfest version of MP-443 Grach.\nThis handgun was developed under designation "Grach" in response to Russian military trials, which began in 1993. In 2003, it was adopted as a standard sidearm for all branches of Russian military and law enforcement, alongside Makarov PM, GSh-18, and SPS. It is chambered for the high-powered 9x19mm 7N21 cartridge, the Russian version of 9mm NATO, loaded to comparable pressure specifications. The 7N21 features an armour-piercing bullet with a tempered steel core.

original.value: Desert Snake Army Jagdkommando

translation.value: Desert Snake Army Jagdkommando

original.value: Special "Desert Snake" version of Jagdkommando.\nJagdkommando is a unique knife that has been milled from a solid piece of stainless steel.Named after the Austrian Armed Special Forces Operation group, the Jagdkommando lives up to its elite namesake.The blade's three sharpened edges twist as they come to a point while the grooved faces feature drilled holes that flow seamlessly together.

translation.value: Special Desert Snake version of Jagdkommando.\nThe Jagdkommando is a unique knife milled from a solid piece of stainless steel. Named after the Austrian Armed Special Forces Operation group, the Jagdkommando lives up to its elite namesake. The blade's three sharpened edges twist as they come to a point while the grooved faces feature drilled holes that flow seamlessly together.

It is widely distributed throughout the world.

It is widely distributed throughout the world.

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\n"Desert Snake" version of Fabarm S.A.T. 8 Pro\nFABARM S.A.T. 8 Pro - modern shotgun made by Fabarm weapon factory. S.A.T. means Semi-Automatic Tactical 8. This weapon designed as for law agencies and also for civilian and sport market. Fabarm S.A.T. 8 Pro is high quality, ergonomic and balance gun. It's automatic is less sensitive to dirt and high reliability.

translation.value: Attachment Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: medium\nDesert Snake version of Fabarm S.A.T. 8 Pro.\nThe FABARM S.A.T. 8 Pro is a modern shotgun made by the Fabarm weapons factory. S.A.T. means Semi-Automatic Tactical 8. This weapon was designed for law enforcement and the civilian and sport markets. The Fabarm S.A.T. 8 Pro is a high-quality, ergonomic, and balanced gun. Its automatic mechanism is not very sensitive to dirt and therefore highly reliable.

original.value: Desert Snake PP-19 Bizon

translation.value: Desert Snake PP-19 Bizon

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium Special "Desert Snake" version of PP-19 Bizon PP-19 Bizon 9x19mm was developed at the request of the Russian Ministry of Internal Affairs by team of engineers headed by Victor Kalashnikov (son of famed AK-47 designer Mikhail Kalashnikov). It's primarily intended for counter-terrorist and law enforcement units that usually need fast and accurate fire at close ranges. One of the Bizon's more unusual features is the magazine, which is often confused for a grenade launcher. The cylinder below the barrel is in fact a 64-round helical-feed magazine, similar to the type used in the American Calico.

translation.value: Attachment Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: medium Special Desert Snake version of PP-19 Bizon. The PP-19 Bizon 9x19mm was developed at the request of the Russian Ministry of Internal Affairs by a team of engineers headed by Victor Kalashnikov (son of famed AK-47 designer Mikhail Kalashnikov). It is primarily intended for counter-terrorist and law enforcement units that usually need fast and accurate fire at close ranges. One of the Bizon's more unusual features is the magazine, which is often confused for a grenade launcher. The cylinder below the barrel is in fact a 64-round helical-feed magazine, similar to the type used in the American Calico.

original.value: CZ 75 Czech Mate Parrot

translation.value: CZ 75 Czechmate Parrot

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope. Recoil: Low\nHave unique attachment C-More red-dot sight.\nThe Czech Mate model (for IPSC Open) is offered in 9x19, either 9mm Luger or 9mm Major, with a four-port compensator. The Czechmate models include a C-More red-dot sight installed on a single-sided CZ mount, and are available in a choice of all-black or colourful 'Parrot'. The colourful 'Parrot' includes three red duralumin basepads, short thin yellow-orange grips, violet cocking lever, red trigger, blue scope mount and a green magazine well.

original.value: Uzkon UNG-12

translation.value: Uzkon UNG-12

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nHave unique attachment Special Shotgun Suppressor.\nThe Uzkon UNG-12 is a shotgun of Turkish origin manufactured by Uzkon. The Uzkon UNG-12 is an eye-catching bull-pup automatic, magazine-fed shotgun sporting a futuristic design and a reinforced polymer lower / machined aluminum upper construction. It is massive in dimensions not your standard, small sized bullpup and offers a fairly intuitive controls configuration, with a cross-button safety located over the trigger guard and a cocking handle located on the left side of the upper receiver.

translation.value: Attachment Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: medium\nHas a unique attachment Special Shotgun Suppressor.\nUzkon UNG-12 is a shotgun of Turkish origin manufactured by Uzkon. Uzkon UNG-12 is an eye-catching bull-pup automatic magazine-fed shotgun. It sports a futuristic design with a reinforced polymer lower and a machined aluminum upper constructions. Uzkon's dimensions are massive - it is not your standard, small sized bullpup. At the same time it offers a fairly intuitive controls configuration, with a cross-button safety located over the trigger guard and a cocking handle located on the left side of the upper receiver.

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium Special Carbon version of Remington MSR. Has unique attachment Bushnell 4x scope and Remington MSR suppressor. Remington MSR is a light aluminium bolt-action sniper rifle developed in late 00s by Remington Arms. MSR stands for Modular Sniper Rifle, as the caliber of the weapon can quickly be changed between .338, .300 and 7.62 via the barrel and bolt swap. This a modern and precise gun, if a bit pricey. US military has already adopted MSR into service, as well as several other countries.

translation.value: Carbon CZ 75 Czechmate Parrot

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope. Recoil: Low Special Carbon version of CZ 75 Czech Mate Parrot. Have unique attachment C-More red-dot sight. The Czech Mate model (for IPSC Open) is offered in 9x19, either 9mm Luger or 9mm Major, with a four-port compensator. The Czechmate models include a C-More red-dot sight installed on a single-sided CZ mount, and are available in a choice of all-black or colourful 'Parrot'. The colourful 'Parrot' includes three red duralumin basepads, short thin yellow-orange grips, violet cocking lever, red trigger, blue scope mount and a green magazine well.

original.value: Carbon RHINO 60DS

translation.value: Carbon Rhino 60 DS

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Low\nSpecial Carbon version of Rhino 60DS. \nThe Chiappa Rhino is a revolver produced by Chiappa Firearms of Italy.The new Chiappa Rhino has revolutionized the revolver with a patented design that tames the prehistoric characteristic that most revolvers possess. It is aligned with the bottom most chamber which is the key component to Rhino's tame characteristics. The position of the barrel lowers the center of gravity and yields a centerline of the bore more in line with the shooter's arm allowing for the most natural "point ability" while engaging a target. This characteristic also drastically reduces both recoil and muzzle flip which insures subsequent shots to be on target faster than ever before.

translation.value: Attachment Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: low\nSpecial Carbon version of Rhino 60 DS. \nThe Chiappa Rhino is a revolver produced by Chiappa Firearms of Italy.The new Chiappa Rhino has revolutionized the revolver with a patented design that tames the prehistoric characteristic, which most revolvers possess. It is aligned with the bottom most chamber that is the key component of Rhino's characteristics. The position of the barrel lowers the center of gravity and yields a centerline of the bore more in line with the shooter's arm allowing for the most natural "point ability" while engaging a target. This characteristic also drastically reduces both recoil and muzzle flip, which insures subsequent shots to be on target faster than ever before.

Remington MSR is a light aluminium bolt-action sniper rifle developed in late 00s by Remington Arms. MSR stands for Modular Sniper Rifle, as the caliber of the weapon can quickly be changed between .338, .300 and 7.62 via the barrel and bolt swap. This a modern and precise gun, if a bit pricey. US military has already adopted MSR into service, as well as several other countries.

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope. Recoil: Medium\nSyndicate version of Taurus Judge\nTaurus Judge is an extremely powerful revolver that uses .410 shotgun shells for ammo. Ammunition size and weight limit the cylinder to only 5 rounds.

translation.value: Attachment Slots: Scope. Recoil: medium\nSyndicate version of Taurus Judge\nTaurus Judge is an extremely powerful revolver that uses .410 shotgun shells for ammo. original.value: Syndicate CZ 75 Czech Mate Parrot

translation.value: Syndicate CZ 75 Czechmate Parrot

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope. Recoil: Low Syndicate version of CZ 75 Czech Mate Parrot Have unique attachment C-More red-dot sight. The Czech Mate model (for IPSC Open) is offered in 9x19, either 9mm Luger or 9mm Major, with a four-port compensator. The Czechmate models include a C-More red-dot sight installed on a single-sided CZ mount, and are available in a choice of all-black or colourful 'Parrot'. The colourful 'Parrot' includes three red duralumin basepads, short thin yellow-orange grips, violet cocking lever, red trigger, blue scope mount and a green magazine well.

original.value: Cartel AS VAL

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope. Recoil: High\nSpecial "Cartel" version of AS VAL.\nThe AS "Val" (Avtomat Special'nyj Val, Special Automatic Rifle, code name: "Shaft") is a Soviet designed assault rifle featuring an integrated suppressor. It was developed during the late 1980s by TsNIITochMash and is used by Russian Spetsnaz special forces and the MVD, FSB and select units of the Russian Army. Since 1987, it was added to the arsenal of the Soviet Army and the KGB. Its effective range is approximately 300 m, as it uses heavy subsonic 9x39mm SP-6 (high performance armor piercing) ammunition, as well as the SP-5 ball round used by the VSS Vintorez.

Recoil: Medium\nSpecial "Cartel" version of M1911A1.\nThe M1911 is a single-action, semi-automatic, magazine-fed, recoil-operated pistol chambered for the .45 ACP cartridge, which served as the standard-issue sidearm for the United States armed forces from 1911 to 1985. It was first used in later stages of the Philippine-American War, and was widely used in World War I, World War II, the Korean War, and the Vietnam War. The improved design was adopted by US Military as M1911A1 pistol, and served with distinction until the mid-1980s,

original.value: Japan Katana

translation.value: Yakuza Katana

original.value: Katana This sword can hit enemies on increased distance. Katana has increased damage. Secondary melee attack is so strong that even will kill enemy in Anti Melee Vests! Special Japan version of Katana. The katana is characterized by its distinctive appearance: a curved, slender, single-edged blade with a circular or squared guard and long grip to accommodate two hands. It has historically been associated with the samurai of feudal Japan and has become renowned for its sharpness and strength.

original.value: Frozen CZ 75 Czech Mate Parrot

translation.value: Icebreaker CZ 75 Czechmate Parrot

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope. Recoil: Low Special Frozen version of CZ 75 Czech Mate Parrot. Have unique attachment C-More red-dot sight. The Czech Mate model (for IPSC Open) is offered in 9x19, either 9mm Luger or 9mm Major, with a four-port compensator. The Czechmate models include a C-More red-dot sight installed on a single-sided CZ mount, and are available in a choice of all-black or colourful 'Parrot'. The colourful 'Parrot' includes three red duralumin basepads, short thin yellow-orange grips, violet cocking lever, red trigger, blue scope mount and a green magazine well.

translation.value: Attachment Slots: Scope. Recoil: low Special Icebreaker version of CZ 75 Czechmate Parrot. Has unique attachments C-More red-dot sight. The Czechmate model (for IPSC Open) is offered in 9x19, either 9mm Luger or 9mm Major, with a four-port compensator. Czechmate models include a C-More red-dot sight installed on a single-sided CZ mount, and are available in a choice of all-black or the colorful 'Parrot' palette. The colorful 'Parrot' includes three red duralumin basepads, short thin yellow-orange grips, violet cocking lever, red trigger, blue scope mount and a green magazine well.

Already compact, SMG-45 also features a folding grip and fully ambidextrous controls, making it very comfortable to handle.

original.value: HK G28

translation.value: H&K G28

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium This weapon deal increased damage against cyborgs on 50%. Has unique attachment HK G28 Silencer, HK G28 suppressor, HK type Vertical Grip, Schmidt Bender 3 Scope 4.5x, Vector Optics Maverick Red Dot Sight. The G28 is a military version of the civilian semi automatic competition rifle MR308. Deployed in the established 7.62 x 51 calibre, the Designated Marksman Rifle DMR ensures accuracy of 1.5 MOA whilst enabling a full night fighting capability. Providing a maximum effective range and a high first round hit probability up to 600 meters, the HK241 will also allow suppressive fire against man size targets accurately up to 800 meters.

Gingerbread Gun

original.value: The Gingerbread Gun is the weapon for real connoisseurs of Christmas mood. You think it is just another harmless pastry? It could never be farther from the truth! Fire it point-blank at your opponent and see what this little tasty guy is capable of.

translation.value: The Gingerbread Gun is the weapon for real connoisseurs of Christmas spirit. You think it's just another harmless pastry? That couldn't be further from the truth! Fire it point-blank at your opponent and see what this tasty little guy is capable of.

original.value: Xmas 2018 VHS-2

translation.value: Santa Hog VHS-2

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nSpecial "Xmas 2018" version of VHS-2.\nThe Croatian VHS-2, is an improved version of the VHS rifle which retains its bullpup design, caliber and barrel length, as well as the internal mechanism, but introduces a new, more conventional fire selector. A redesigned carrying handle, an adjustable-length buttstock, and an ambidextrous cartridge casings ejection system that can be configured for either right or left side ejection in less than a minute.

translation.value: Attachment Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: medium\nSpecial Santa Hog version of VHS-2.\nThe Croatian VHS-2 is an improved version of the VHS rifle that retains its bullpup design, caliber, and barrel length, as well as its internal mechanism, but introduces a new, more conventional fire selector. It offers a redesigned carrying handle, an adjustable-length buttstock, and an ambidextrous cartridge casings ejection system that can be configured for either right- or left-side ejection in less than a minute.

original.value: Xmas 2018 Saiga Custom

translation.value: Santa Hog Saiga Custom

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Low\nSpecial "Xmas 2018" version of Saiga Custom.\nThe Saiga is a Kalashnikov-pattern 12 gauge combat shotgun available in a wide range of configurations. Like the Kalashnikov rifle variants, it is a rotating bolt, gas-operated gun that feeds from a box magazine.

translation.value: Attachment Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: low\nSpecial Santa Hog version of Saiga Custom.\nThe Saiga is a Kalashnikov-pattern 12 gauge combat shotgun available in a wide range of configurations. original.value: Xmas 2018 UZI PRO

translation.value: Santa Hog Uzi Pro

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Rail, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nSpecial "Xmas 2018" version of UZI PRO.\nUZI PRO SMG is the newest member of the legendary UZI family one of the most popular weapon families in the world, with millions of units sold around the globe. The UZI PRO is an ideal solution for both concealed or openly carried use for law enforcement, VIP protection and Special Forces. It created for special AAC 300 Blackout ammo caliber. Produced by Advanced Armament Corporation as replacement for HK MP5 and similar CQB weapon systems. Have integrated customized silencer.

translation.value: Attachment Slots: Scope, Rail, Muzzle. Recoil: medium\nSpecial Santa Hog version of Uzi Pro.\nThe Uzi Pro SMG is the newest member of the legendary UZI family, one of the most popular weapon families in the world, with millions of units sold around the globe. The Uzi Pro is an ideal solution for both concealed or open-carry use, for law enforcement, VIP protection, and Special Forces. It was created for the special AAC 300 Blackout ammo caliber. Produced by the Advanced Armament Corporation as a replacement for the HK MP5 and similar CQB weapon systems. Has an integrated customized silencer.

original.value: Xmas 2018 Gepard GM6 Lynx

translation.value: Santa Hog Gepard GM6 Lynx

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope. Recoil: Medium This weapon deal increased damage against cyborgs on 50%. Has unique attachment Schmidt & Bender v2 4.6x scope. Special "Xmas 2018" version of Gepard GM6 Lynx. Gepard GM6 Lynx is a Hungarian semi-automatic anti-material rifle, developed in the late 80s. Featuring a bullpup layout and a sliding barrel, it is relatively compact for a weapon with such firepower. The weight distribution of the gun also allows to operate the rifle in off-hand hand position, which is much more difficult when it comes to other high-caliber rifles.

translation.value: Attachment Slots: Rail, Scope. Recoil: medium Has unique attachments Schmidt & Bender v2 4.6x scope. Special Santa Hog version of Gepard GM6 Lynx. The Gepard GM6 Lynx is a Hungarian semi-automatic anti-materiel rifle developed in the late 80s. Featuring a bullpup layout and a sliding barrel, it is relatively compact for a weapon with such firepower. The weight distribution of the gun also allows the rifle to be operated in off-hand hand position, which is much more difficult when it comes to other high-caliber rifles.

original.value: Ak-Alpha "Absolute Power"

translation.value: Absolute AK Alpha

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\n"Absolute Power" version of Ak-Alpha \nThe AK-Alfa is a revolutionary approach to weapons upgrades. A handpicked team of snipers and engineers from the IDF Special Forces designed the Alfa rifle to allow the shooter to maximize his shooting abilities, with the most reliable weapon on the planet. An iconic firearms platform now reborn as the new Israeli Kalashnikov to be the apex of technology. The weapon's unique features include comfortable recoil, high rate of fire and heavy-piercing bullet with additional damage to limbs and additional damage at long ranges. AK-Alpha staffed with Tactical Silencer, AK-Alpha suppressor, Tactical Grip, Sig Sauer Romeo 4 RDS and Hartman MH1 RDS.

translation.value: Attachment Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: medium\n"Absolute" version of the AK Alpha\nThe AK Alpha is a revolutionary approach to weapons upgrades. A handpicked team of expert marksmen and engineers from the IDF Special Forces designed the Alpha rifle to allow the shooter to maximize his shooting abilities, with the most reliable weapon on the planet. An iconic firearms platform now reborn as the new Israeli Kalashnikov to be the apex of technology. The weapon's unique features include comfortable recoil, high rate of fire and heavy-piercing munitions capability with additional damage to limbs and additional damage at long ranges. AK Alpha staffed with Tactical Silencer, AK Alpha suppressor, Tactical Grip, Sig Sauer Romeo 4 RDS and Hartman MH1 RDS.

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: High\nSpecial Jogos version of Imbel IA2.\nThe IA2 assault rifle designed for the Brazilian Armed Forces to replace FN FAL and M16A2. IA2 has long list of pros: universal STANAG magazine, high power, good accuracy on long range, high durability and reliability in extreme conditions.

Recoil: high\nSpecial Vibrant version of Imbel IA2.\nThe IA2 assault rifle was designed for the Brazilian Armed Forces to replace the FN FAL and M16A2. original.value: Jogos SR-2 Veresk

translation.value: Vibrant SR-2 Veresk

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Low\nSpecial Jogos version of the SR-2 Veresk. \nThe SR-2 Veresk submachine gun has been in development since mid-1990s; It wasdeveloped by the Central Scientific-Research Institute of Precise Mechanical Engineering (TSNIITOCHMASH) under request of FSB. Afterthe successful development of powerful 9x21 SP-10armor piercing ammunition and SR-1 pistol to fire it, FSB also requested a submachine gun to fire same ammunition.

translation.value: Attachment Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: low\nSpecial Vibrant version of SR-2 Veresk. \nThe SR-2 Veresk submachine gun has been in development since the mid-1990s. It was developed by the Central Scientific Research Institute of Precise Mechanical Engineering (TSNIITOCHMASH) at the request of the FSB. After the successful development of powerful 9x21 SP-10 armor-piercing ammunition and the SR-1 pistol to fire it, the FSB also requested a submachine gun to fire the same ammunition.

original.value: Jogos Kel-Tec

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nSpecial Jogos 2016 camouflage version of the Kel-Tec Shotgun. \nThe Kel-Tec KSG is a bullpup pump action shotgun. It was developed by private US-based arms-making company Kel-tec CNC industries, which is known for their innovative products. It was officially announced at the ShotShow-2011, and production is scheduled to mid-2011.

original.value: Gold Glock 18C

translation.value: Golden Glock 18C

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Muzzle. Recoil: High This weapon deal increased damage against cyborgs. Gold version of the Glock 18c. The Glock 18 is a selective fire variant of the Glock 17, developed at the request of the Austrian counter-terrorist unit EKO Cobra. This machine pistol-class firearm has a lever-type fire-control selector. With the selector lever in the bottom position, the pistol will shoot fully automatic. The firearm is typically used with an extended 33-round capacity magazine.

translation.value: Attachment Slots: Muzzle. Recoil: high This weapon deals increased damage against cyborgs. Golden version of Glock 18c. The Glock 18 is a selective-fire version of the Glock 17, developed at the request of Austrian counter-terrorist unit EKO Cobra. This machine pistol-class firearm has a lever-type fire-control selector. With the selector lever in the bottom position, the pistol will shoot fully automatically. The firearm is typically used with an extended 33-round capacity magazine.

original.value: Syndicate HK G28

translation.value: Syndicate H&K G28

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium This weapon deal increased damage against cyborgs on 50%. Syndicate version of HK G28 Has unique attachment HK G28 Silencer, HK G28 suppressor, HK type Vertical Grip, Schmidt Bender 3 Scope 4.5x, Vector Optics Maverick Red Dot Sight. The G28 is a military version of the civilian semi automatic competition rifle MR308. Deployed in the established 7.62 x 51 calibre, the Designated Marksman Rifle DMR ensures accuracy of 1.5 MOA whilst enabling a full night fighting capability. Providing a maximum effective range and a high first round hit probability up to 600 meters, the HK241 will also allow suppressive fire against man size targets accurately up to 800 meters.

translation.value: Attachment Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: medium This weapon deals increased by 50% damage against cyborgs. Syndicate version of H&K G28 Has unique attachments H&K G28 Silencer, H&K G28 suppressor, HK type Vertical Grip, Schmidt Bender 3 Scope 4.5x, Vector Optics Maverick Red Dot Sight. The G28 is a military version of the civilian semi-automatic competition rifle MR308. Deployed in established 7.62 x 51 caliber, the Designated Marksman Rifle (DMR) ensures an accuracy of 1.5 MOA while enabling full night-fighting capability. Providing a maximum effective range and a high first round hit probability up to 600 meters, the HK241 will also allow suppressive fire against human-size targets accurately up to 800 meters.

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope. Recoil: Low\nThe Dagger SAP6 is a heavy duty mag fed shotgun.The new design features include a heavy-duty monolithic quadrail system and a re-designed aluminum pump handle for use with included vertical foregrip. The development of the original SAP6 shotgun sought to overcome many of the shortfalls of the common and dated shotgun design. The use of a detachable magazine allows for a shorter barrel without the sacrifice of magazine capacity.

translation.value: Attachment Slots: Scope, . Recoil: low\nDagger SAP6 is a heavy-duty magazine-fed shotgun. Its new design features include a heavy-duty monolithic quadrail system and a re-designed aluminum pump handle to use with the included vertical foregrip. The developers of the original SAP6 shotgun sought to overcome many shortfalls of the common and outdated shotgun design. The use of a detachable magazine allows for a shorter barrel without sacrificing magazine capacity.
