original.value: Yakuza HCAR

translation.value: Yakuza HCAR

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium Yakuza version of the HCAR. This weapon deals double damage to the body and extremities.<> This weapon deals increased damage against cyborgs on 50%. HCAR is a modernized version of the legendary BAR rifle, produced by Ohio Ordnance Works. The original BAR have seen action in both World Wars, and HCAR is a worthy successor for such a venerated ancestor. This semi-automatic rifle uses powerful .30-06 ammo, packing a superb punch. Compared to its predecessor, it also boasts greatly reduced weight and improved ergonomics.

translation.value: Attachment Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: medium Yakuza version of HCAR. This weapon deals double damage to the body and extremities. HCAR is a modernized version of the legendary BAR rifle, produced by Ohio Ordnance Works. The original BAR saw action in both World Wars, and HCAR is a worthy successor of such a venerated ancestor. This semi-automatic rifle uses powerful .30-06 ammo, packing a superb punch. Compared to its predecessor, it also boasts greatly reduced weight and improved ergonomics.

original.value: Yakuza Remington MSR

translation.value: Yakuza Remington MSR

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium Yakuza version of Remington MSR Has unique attachment Bushnell 4x scope and Remington MSR suppressor. Remington MSR is a light aluminium bolt-action sniper rifle developed in late 00s by Remington Arms. MSR stands for Modular Sniper Rifle, as the caliber of the weapon can quickly be changed between .338, .300 and 7.62 via the barrel and bolt swap. This a modern and precise gun, if a bit pricey. US military has already adopted MSR into service, as well as several other countries.

translation.value: Attachment Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: medium Yakuza version of Remington MSR Has unique attachment Bushnell 4x scope and Remington MSR suppressor. MSR stands for Modular Sniper Rifle, as the caliber of the weapon can quickly be changed between .338, .300, and 7.62 via the barrel and bolt swap. This is a modern and precise gun, if a bit pricey. The US military has already adopted MSR into service, as have several other countries.

original.value: Yakuza M1911A1

translation.value: Yakuza M1911A1

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nSpecial "Yakuza" version of M1911A1.\nThe M1911 is a single-action, semi-automatic, magazine-fed, recoil-operated pistol chambered for the .45 ACP cartridge, which served as the standard-issue sidearm for the United States armed forces from 1911 to 1985. It was first used in later stages of the Philippine-American War, and was widely used in World War I, World War II, the Korean War, and the Vietnam War. The improved design was adopted by US Military as M1911A1 pistol, and served with distinction until the mid-1980s,

translation.value: Attachment Slots: Muzzle. Recoil: medium\nSpecial "Yakuza" version of M1911A1.\nM1911 is a single-action, semi-automatic, magazine-fed, recoil-operated pistol chambered for the .45 ACP cartridge, which served as the standard-issue sidearm for the United States armed forces from 1911 to 1985. It was first used in later stages of the Philippine-American War, and was widely used in World War I, World War II, the Korean War, and the Vietnam War. The improved design was adopted by US Military as M1911A1 pistol, and served with distinction until the mid-1980s.

original.value: Cyber Pro Uzkon UNG-12

Have unique attachment Special Shotgun Suppressor. The Uzkon UNG-12 is a shotgun of Turkish origin manufactured by Uzkon. The Uzkon UNG-12 is an eye-catching bull-pup automatic, magazine-fed shotgun sporting a futuristic design and a reinforced polymer lower / machined aluminum upper construction. It is massive in dimensions not your standard, small sized bullpup and offers a fairly intuitive controls configuration, with a cross-button safety located over the trigger guard and a cocking handle located on the left side of the upper receiver.

Recoil: Medium\nCyber Pro version of FN FAL DSA 58.\nAmerican company DSA (David Selveggio Arms) manufactures a copy of the FAL called the DSA-58 that is made with the same Steyr-Daimler-Puch production line equipment as the StG-58. Civilian models are semi-automatic, but military and Law Enforcement clients can procure select-fire models that have a fully automatic cyclic rate of 620 rounds/minute. This motel has unique comfortable tactical grip with unique features and heavy-piercing ammo with additional damage to limbs and additional damage at long ranges.

original.value: Marlin 1894 Custom

translation.value: Marlin 1894 Custom

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nHave unique attachment Viper MOA, Osprey 9 Silencer .\n The Marlin 1894 is a traditional lever-action rifle that's quick handling, and delivers rapid fire with a powerful cartridge. Originally patented on August 1, 1893 by L.L. Hepburn, the Model 1894 features a revolutionary lever-fire system with repeat-fire capability. The Model 1894 included a new locking bolt and two-piece firing pin, alongside an improved one-piece trigger and a short receiver that enabled cartridge compatibility with 1888 and 1889 models.

translation.value: Attachment Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nHas unique attachments: Vortex Viper collimator, Osprey 9 silencer .\n The Marlin 1894 is a traditional lever-action rifle that has easy controls and delivers rapid fire with a powerful cartridge. Originally patented on August 1, 1893 by L.L. Hepburn, the model of 1894 features a revolutionary lever system with repeat-fire capability. The Marlin 1894 includes a new locking bolt and a two-piece firing pin, alongside an improved one-piece trigger and a short receiver that enables cartridge compatibility with 1888 and 1889 models.

original.value: SIG MPX SBR Custom

translation.value: SIG MPX SBR Custom

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Low\nSIG MPX SBR Custom is a 4-burst round sub-machine gun. Unconventional design. Unmatched performance. The SIG MPX redefines the submachine gun category with a new level of operator safety, in-field adaptability and proven reliability in the harshest enviroments. There's nothing else like it. And it is only available from SIG.

translation.value: Attachment Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Low\nThis version deals increased damage to the limbs.\nSIG MPX SBR Custom is a 4-burst round submachine gun. Unconventional design. There's nothing else like it. And it is only available from SIG.

original.value: Tommy Gun M1928

translation.value: Thompson M1928

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope. Recoil: Low\nThe Thompson M1928 is a select-fire submachine gun designed and developed in the United States. It was manufactured by Auto-Ordnance and chambered in the popular .45 ACP ammunition. The Thompson submachine gun was famously used during the Prohibition era used by law enforcement individuals, marines and mafia criminals.

original.value: MARS Defibrillator

translation.value: MARS Defibrillator

original.value: Basic Defibrillator \n This defibrillator can revive dead teammate. After used, medic has to wait some time to use once more.

translation.value: MARS Defibrillator \n This defibrillator can revive dead teammate. After reviving a teammate with this defibrillator, medics will have to wait while it recharges before they can put it to work again.

original.value: Deimos VHS-2

translation.value: Deimos VHS-2

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope. Recoil: Medium\nSpecial "Deimos" version of VHS-2.\nThe Croatian VHS-2, is an improved version of the VHS rifle which retains its bullpup design, caliber and barrel length, as well as the internal mechanism, but introduces a new, more conventional fire selector. A redesigned carrying handle, an adjustable-length buttstock, and an ambidextrous cartridge casings ejection system that can be configured for either right or left side ejection in less than a minute.

translation.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nSpecial "Deimos" version of VHS-2.\nThe Croatian VHS-2, is an improved version of the VHS rifle which retains its bullpup design, caliber and barrel length, as well as the internal mechanism, but introduces a new, more conventional fire selector. A redesigned carrying handle, an adjustable-length buttstock, and an ambidextrous cartridge casings ejection system that can be configured for either right or left side ejection in less than a minute.

original.value: Deimos Hera Arms CQR

translation.value: Deimos Hera Arms CQR

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nSpecial "Deimos" version of Hera Arms CQR.\nThis weapon is basically an AR-15, clad in modern set of accessories produced by Germany-based Hera Arms. The result is a highly ergonomic system, strong and lightweight. Pair this with a Magpul-made drum magazine, and you get a comfortbale assault rifle capable of prolonged and controlable sustained fire.

original.value: Deimos M249 Para

translation.value: Deimos M249 Para

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nSpecial "Deimos" version of M249 Para.\nIt's gas operated and air cooled. A folding bipod is attached near the front of the gun, though an M192 LGM tripod is also available.

original.value: Deimos Uzi Pro

translation.value: Deimos Uzi Pro

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. The UZI PRO is an ideal solution for both concealed or openly carried use for law enforcement, VIP protection and Special Forces.

original.value: Deimos LWRC SMG-45

translation.value: Deimos LWRC SMG-45

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: High Has unique attachment LWRC SMG-45 RDS and LWRC SMG-45 Angled Fore Grip Special "Deimos" version of LWRC SMG-45. LWRC SMG-45 is a modern sub-machine gun from US-based manufacturer LWRC International, first unveiled in 2016. This powerful SMG takes HK UMP magazines with .45 ACP ammo. Compared to most other SMGs, .45 ACP offers a superb punch and stopping power. Already compact, SMG-45 also features a folding grip and fully ambidextrous controls, making it very comfortable to handle.

translation.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: High Has unique attachment LWRC SMG-45 RDS and LWRC SMG-45 Angled Fore Grip Special "Deimos" version of LWRC SMG-45. original.value: Deimos Uzkon UNG-12

translation.value: Deimos Uzkon UNG-12

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium Have unique attachment Special Shotgun Suppressor Special "Deimos" version of Uzkon UNG-12. The Uzkon UNG-12 is a shotgun of Turkish origin manufactured by Uzkon. The Uzkon UNG-12 is an eye-catching bull-pup automatic, magazine-fed shotgun sporting a futuristic design and a reinforced polymer lower / machined aluminum upper construction. It is massive in dimensions not your standard, small sized bullpup and offers a fairly intuitive controls configuration, with a cross-button safety located over the trigger guard and a cocking handle located on the left side of the upper receiver.

translation.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium Have unique attachment Special Shotgun Suppressor Special "Deimos" version of Uzkon UNG-12. It is massive in dimensions not your standard, small sized bullpup and offers a fairly intuitive controls configuration, with a cross-button safety located over the trigger guard and a cocking handle located on the left side of the upper receiver.

original.value: Deimos SAP-6

translation.value: Deimos SAP-6

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope. Recoil: Low\nSpecial "Deimos" version of SAP-6.\nThe Dagger SAP6 is a heavy duty mag fed shotgun.The new design features include a heavy-duty monolithic quadrail system and a re-designed aluminum pump handle for use with included vertical foregrip. The development of the original SAP6 shotgun sought to overcome many of the shortfalls of the common and dated shotgun design. The use of a detachable magazine allows for a shorter barrel without the sacrifice of magazine capacity.

translation.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope. Recoil: Low\nSpecial "Deimos" version of SAP-6.\nThe Dagger SAP6 is a heavy duty mag fed shotgun. The new design features include a heavy-duty monolithic quadrail system and a re-designed aluminum pump handle for use with included vertical foregrip. The development of the original SAP6 shotgun sought to overcome many of the shortfalls of the common and dated shotgun design. The use of a detachable magazine allows for a shorter barrel without the sacrifice of magazine capacity.

original.value: Deimos AT308

The AT (Accuracy Tactical) continues the legacy of the combat proven AW308 and takes the AW to new levels. AT308 has a fixed stock with 24 inch, quick change, plain barrel. The AT is ideal for Law Enforcement and civilian users.

original.value: Deimos HK G28

translation.value: Deimos H&K G28

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium This weapon deal increased damage against cyborgs on 50%. Has unique attachment HK G28 Silencer, HK G28 suppressor, HK type Vertical Grip, Schmidt Bender 3 Scope 4.5x, Vector Optics Maverick Red Dot Sight Special "Deimos" version of HK G28. The G28 is a military version of the civilian semi automatic competition rifle MR308. Deployed in the established 7.62 x 51 calibre, the Designated Marksman Rifle DMR ensures accuracy of 1.5 MOA whilst enabling a full night fighting capability. Providing a maximum effective range and a high first round hit probability up to 600 meters, the HK241 will also allow suppressive fire against man size targets accurately up to 800 meters.

translation.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium This weapon deals increased by 50% damage against cyborgs. Has unique attachment H&K G28 Silencer, H&K G28 suppressor, H&K type Vertical Grip, Schmidt Bender 3 Scope 4.5x, Vector Optics Maverick Red Dot Sight Special "Deimos" version of H&K G28. The G28 is a military version of the civilian semi-automatic competition rifle MR308. Deployed in the established 7.62 x 51 caliber, the Designated Marksman Rifle DMR ensures accuracy of 1.5 MOA whilst enabling a full night fighting capability. Providing a maximum effective range and a high first round hit probability up to 600 meters, the H&K G28 will also allow suppressive fire against man size targets accurately up to 800 meters.

original.value: Deimos Glock 18C

translation.value: Deimos Glock 18C

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Muzzle. Recoil: High\nSpecial "Deimos" version of Glock 18C.\nThe Glock 18 is a selective fire variant of the Glock 17, developed at the request of the Austrian counter-terrorist unit EKO Cobra. This machine pistol-class firearm has a lever-type fire-control selector. With the selector lever in the bottom position, the pistol will shoot fully automatic. The firearm is typically used with an extended 33-round capacity magazine.

translation.value: Attachment's Slots: Muzzle. Recoil: High\nSpecial "Deimos" version of Glock 18C.\nThe Glock 18 is a selective fire variant of the Glock 17, developed at the request of the Austrian counter-terrorist unit EKO Cobra. This machine pistol-class firearm has a lever-type fire-control selector. With the selector lever in the bottom position, the pistol will shoot fully automatic. The firearm is typically used with an extended 33-round capacity magazine.

original.value: Deimos CZ 75 Czech Mate Parrot

translation.value: Deimos CZ 75 Czech Mate Parrot

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope. Recoil: Low Have unique attachment C-More red-dot sight Special "Deimos" version of CZ 75 Czech Mate Parrot. The Czech Mate model (for IPSC Open) is offered in 9x19, either 9mm Luger or 9mm Major, with a four-port compensator. The Czechmate models include a C-More red-dot sight installed on a single-sided CZ mount, and are available in a choice of all-black or colourful 'Parrot'. The colourful 'Parrot' includes three red duralumin basepads, short thin yellow-orange grips, violet cocking lever, red trigger, blue scope mount and a green magazine well.

translation.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope. Recoil: Low Have unique attachment C-More red-dot sight Special "Deimos" version of CZ 75 Czech Mate Parrot. The Czech Mate model (for IPSC Open) is offered in 9x19, either 9mm Luger or 9mm Major, with a four-port compensator. The Czechmate models include a C-More red-dot sight installed on a single-sided CZ mount, and are available in a choice of all-black or colorful 'Parrot'. The colorful 'Parrot' includes three red duralumin basepads, short thin yellow-orange grips, violet cocking lever, red trigger, blue scope mount and a green magazine well.

original.value: Phobos Ak-Alpha

translation.value: Phobos AK Alpha

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nSpecial Phobos version of Ak-Alpha\nThe Ak-Alpha is a revolutionary approach to weapons upgrades. A handpicked team of snipers and engineers from the IDF Special Forces designed the Alfa rifle to allow the shooter to maximize his shooting abilities, with the most reliable weapon on the planet. An iconic firearms platform now reborn as the new Israeli Kalashnikov to be the apex of technology. The weapon's unique features include comfortable recoil, high rate of fire and heavy-piercing bullet with additional damage to limbs and additional damage at long ranges. AK-Alpha staffed with Tactical Silencer, AK-Alpha suppressor, Tactical Grip, Sig Sauer Romeo 4 RDS and Hartman MH1 RDS.

Has unique attachment KRISS Super V Tactical Grip, KRISS Super V Silencer and Redring MK2 Scope with fast zoom. The Kriss Super V submachine gun was developed by Transformational Defense Industries (TDI). Its name comes from Indonesian sword or large knife. Production of this weapon commenced in 2009. At some point the company became known as Kriss USA and the weapon was rebranded as Vector. TDI Vector or Kriss Super V has excellent accuracy even in continuous fire, making it reliable in various situation. It also comes with an attachable Silencer

original.value: Phobos SAP-6

translation.value: Phobos SAP-6

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope. Recoil: Low\nSpecial "Phobos" version of SAP-6.\nThe Dagger SAP6 is a heavy duty mag fed shotgun.The new design features include a heavy-duty monolithic quadrail system and a re-designed aluminum pump handle for use with included vertical foregrip. The development of the original SAP6 shotgun sought to overcome many of the shortfalls of the common and dated shotgun design. The use of a detachable magazine allows for a shorter barrel without the sacrifice of magazine capacity.

original.value: Phobos Orsis T-5000

translation.value: Phobos Orsis T-5000

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Low\nSpecial Phobos version of Orsis T-5000. \nThe Orsis T-5000 is a Russian bolt-action sniper rifle. It was the first product developed by ORSIS, and is produced in their Moscow factory. The rifle was introduced in 2011 at the international exhibition of Russian weapons in Nizhny Tagil. The Sniper Rifle has high accuracy and high chance to make one shot kill. Now even protective gloves and protective shoes won't save your enemies at close quarters and middle distances.

original.value: Phobos Kraken CDX MC

translation.value: Phobos Kraken CDX MC

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium Special "Phobos" version of Kraken CDX MC. Have unique attachment Defence Falcon Bipod, Cadex Defence Precision Silencer, Kraken Special Suppressor, ATACR 4.5x scope. The CDX-MC KRAKEN, is a multi-caliber rifle using an innovative (patent pending) barrel change system. This multi-caliber system features the lowest shift of point of impact between takedown and reassembly of the same barrel on the market. A single screw secures the chassis detachable base for a fast conversion between short and long action calibers.

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Muzzle. Recoil: High\nSpecial Phobos version of Stechkin APS. \nThe Stechkin APS (Avtomaticheskiy Pistolet Stetchkina) is a Russian selective fire machine pistol. original.value: Phobos Micro Desert Eagle

translation.value: Phobos Micro Desert Eagle

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nSpecial Phobos version of Micro Desert Eagle. \nSharing all the family traits of the world-famous Desert Eagle pistol, Magnum's Micro Desert Eagle pistol, chambered in .380 ACP, is the ultimate in compact personal protection. Small enough to nest comfortably at home, in a pocket or in a purse, the double action only Micro Desert Eagle is proudly made in the U.S. and weighs less than 14 oz. But don't let its size fool you. The Micro Desert Eagle provides big-time protection with a gas-assisted blowback system for ultimate reliability and amazing accuracy. Which only goes to prove that good things do indeed come in small packages.

original.value: M16A3 Custom Tourney

translation.value: M16A3 Custom Fiesta

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: High\nSpecial Tourney camouflage version of the M16A3. \n The M16A3 Custom, now standard issue for front-line U.S. Marine Corps and some U.S. Army units, replaces the combination fixed carry handle/rear iron sight with a MIL-STD-1913 Picatinny rail, allowing for the rifle to be equipped with a carry handle and/or most military and consumer scopes or sighting systems.

translation.value: Attachment Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: high\nSpecial Football Fiesta version of the M16A3.\nThe M16A3 is now the standard issue for front-line U.S. Marine Corps and some U.S. Army units. It has replaced the fixed carry-handle / rear iron sight with a rail, which allows the rifle to be equipped with a carry handle and/or most military and consumer scopes or sighting systems.

original.value: Honey Badger Tourney

translation.value: Honey Badger Fiesta

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Rail. Recoil: High\nSpecial Tourney camouflage version of the Honey Badger. \n The AAC Honey Badger PDW is an special PDW weapon based on the AR-15.Have integrated customized sub-sonic silencer. It created for special AAC 300 Blackout ammo caliber. Produced by Advanced Armament Corporation as replacement for HK MP5 and similar CQB weapon systems. Have integrated customized silencer.

translation.value: Attachment Slots: Scope, Rail. Recoil: high\nSpecial Football Fiesta version of the Honey Badger \nThe Honey Badger is an special PDW weapon with an integrated customized silencer. It was created for special sub-sonic ACR caliber ammo. It was produced as a replacement for the H&K MP5 and similar CQB weapon systems.

original.value: Fabarm STF 12 Compact Tourney

translation.value: Fabarm STF 12 Compact Fiesta

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. translation.value: Social Justice VHS-2

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nSpecial "Vkontakte" version of VHS-2.\nThe Croatian VHS-2, is an improved version of the VHS rifle which retains its bullpup design, caliber and barrel length, as well as the internal mechanism, but introduces a new, more conventional fire selector. A redesigned carrying handle, an adjustable-length buttstock, and an ambidextrous cartridge casings ejection system that can be configured for either right or left side ejection in less than a minute.

translation.value: Attachment Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nSocial Justice version of VHS-2.\nThe Croatian VHS-2 is an improved version of the VHS rifle that retains its bullpup design, caliber and barrel length, as well as the internal mechanism, but introduces a new, more conventional fire selector. It offers a redesigned carrying handle, an adjustable-length buttstock and an ambidextrous cartridge casings ejection system that can be configured for either right or left side use in less than a minute.

original.value: Vkontakte M1911A1

translation.value: Social Justice M1911A1

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nSpecial "Vkontakte" version of M1911A1\n The M1911 is a single-action, semi-automatic, magazine-fed, recoil-operated pistol chambered for the .45 ACP cartridge, which served as the standard-issue sidearm for the United States armed forces from 1911 to 1985. It was first used in later stages of the Philippine-American War, and was widely used in World War I, World War II, the Korean War, and the Vietnam War. The improved design was adopted by US Military as M1911A1 pistol, and served with distinction until the mid-1980s.

translation.value: Attachment Slots: Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nSocial Justice version of M1911A1\n M1911 is a single-action, semi-automatic, magazine-fed, recoil-operated pistol chambered for the .45 ACP cartridge, which served as the standard-issue sidearm for the United States armed forces from 1911 to 1985. It was first used in the later stages of the Philippine-American War, and was widely used in World War I, World War II, the Korean War, and the Vietnam War. The improved design was adopted by US Military as M1911A1 pistol, and served with distinction until the mid 1980s.

original.value: Vkontakte SAP-6

translation.value: Social Justice SAP6

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope. Recoil: Low\nSpecial "Vkontakte" version of SAP-6.\nThe Dagger SAP6 is a heavy duty mag fed shotgun.The new design features include a heavy-duty monolithic quadrail system and a re-designed aluminum pump handle for use with included vertical foregrip. The development of the original SAP6 shotgun sought to overcome many of the shortfalls of the common and dated shotgun design. The use of a detachable magazine allows for a shorter barrel without the sacrifice of magazine capacity.

translation.value: Attachment Slots: Scope. Recoil: Low\nSocial Justice version of SAP6.\nDagger SAP6 is a heavy-duty mag-fed shotgun. The new design features include a heavy-duty monolithic quadrail system and a re-designed aluminum pump handle for use with included vertical foregrip. The development of the original SAP6 shotgun sought to overcome many of the shortfalls of the common and outdated shotgun design. The use of a detachable magazine allows for a shorter barrel without sacrificing magazine capacity.

original.value: Open Cup 2019 Ak-Alpha

translation.value: Open Cup 2019 AK Alpha

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nSpecial Open Cup 2019 version of Ak-Alpha\nThe Ak-Alpha is a revolutionary approach to weapons upgrades. A handpicked team of snipers and engineers from the IDF Special Forces designed the Alfa rifle to allow the shooter to maximize his shooting abilities, with the most reliable weapon on the planet. An iconic firearms platform now reborn as the new Israeli Kalashnikov to be the apex of technology. The weapon's unique features include comfortable recoil, high rate of fire and heavy-piercing bullet with additional damage to limbs and additional damage at long ranges. AK-Alpha staffed with Tactical Silencer, AK-Alpha suppressor, Tactical Grip, Sig Sauer Romeo 4 RDS and Hartman MH1 RDS.

translation.value: Attachment Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nSpecial Open Cup 2019 version of AK Alpha\nAK Alpha is a revolutionary approach to weapons upgrades. A hand-picked team of snipers and engineers from the IDF Special Forces designed it to allow the shooter to maximize their natural abilities with the most reliable weapon on the planet. An iconic firearms platform was thus reborn as the new Israeli Kalashnikov to be the apex of technology. The weapon's unique features include comfortable recoil, high rate of fire and heavy-piercing bullets with additional damage to limbs and additional damage at long ranges. AK Alpha comes with a Tactical Silencer, AK-Alpha suppressor, Tactical Grip, Sig Sauer Romeo 4 RDS and Hartman MH1 RDS.

original.value: FCG-R3 K2

translation.value: FCG-R3 K2

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope. Recoil: Middle\nExperimental armor-piercing rifle. Shoot by special high caliber and high armor-piercing cluster bullet. Special modification of FCG-R3 developed for less expensive ammo unlike original FCG-R3 . Due to this modification shells have increased caliber and what's why weapon have longer bolt-action time and longer reload action.

translation.value: Attachment slots: Scope. Recoil: Medium\nAn experimental armor-piercing rifle. Utilizes special high-caliber and high armor-piercing cluster bullets. It is a special modification of the FCG-R3 developed for less expensive ammo, unlike the original FCG-R3. Due to this modification, shells have increased caliber, which is why this weapon has longer bolt-action time and longer reload action.

original.value: Vietnam Tiger AS VAL

translation.value: Tigerstripe AS VAL

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope. Recoil: High\nSpecial "Vietnam Tiger" version of AS VAL.\nThe AS "Val" (Avtomat Special'nyj Val, Special Automatic Rifle, code name: "Shaft") is a Soviet designed assault rifle featuring an integrated suppressor. It was developed during the late 1980s by TsNIITochMash and is used by Russian Spetsnaz special forces and the MVD, FSB and select units of the Russian Army. Since 1987, it was added to the arsenal of the Soviet Army and the KGB. Its effective range is approximately 300 m, as it uses heavy subsonic 9x39mm SP-6 (high performance armor piercing) ammunition, as well as the SP-5 ball round used by the VSS Vintorez.

translation.value: Attachment slots: Rail, Scope. Recoil: High\nA special Tigerstripe version of the AS VAL.\nThe AS VAL (Avtomat Special'nyj Val, Special Automatic Rifle, code name "Shaft") is a Soviet-designed assault rifle featuring an integrated suppressor. It was developed during the late 1980s by TsNIITochMash and is used by Russian Spetsnaz forces, the MVD, the FSB, and select units of the Russian Army. In 1987 it was added to the arsenal of the Soviet Army and the KGB. Its effective range is approximately 300m, as it uses heavy subsonic 9x39mm SP-6 (high-performance armor-piercing) ammunition, as well as the SP-5 ball round used by the VSS Vintorez.

original.value: Vietnam Tiger CZ 75 Czech Mate Parrot

translation.value: Tigerstripe CZ 75 Czech Mate Parrot

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope. Recoil: Low Have unique attachment C-More red-dot sight Special "Vietnam Tiger" version of CZ 75 Czech Mate Parrot. The Czech Mate model (for IPSC Open) is offered in 9x19, either 9mm Luger or 9mm Major, with a four-port compensator. The Czechmate models include a C-More red-dot sight installed on a single-sided CZ mount, and are available in a choice of all-black or colourful 'Parrot'. The colourful 'Parrot' includes three red duralumin basepads, short thin yellow-orange grips, violet cocking lever, red trigger, blue scope mount and a green magazine well.

original.value: Rune AK-12

translation.value: Berserk AK-12

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium Special Rune version of AK-12 Have unique attachment AK-12 Special Suppressor, AK-12 Special Silencer, AK-12 Special Grip, Romeo 4 Sight. The AK-12 is a modern assault rifle designed to replace the legendary AK-74 as the general issue weapon for the Russian army. The weapon introduces many improvements over its predecessors: better recoil control, suitable for various ammunition types, compatibility with several accessories, and better ergonomics. This particular version is chambered in 5.45x39 mm, so it trades a bit of accuracy for a bigger punch and better penetration.

translation.value: Attachment slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Middle\nSpecial Rune version of Tavor TS12В Custom. \n The Tavor TS12 is a 12 gauge bullpup shotgun with the capability of being configured for left- or right-handed ejection and operation. It is gas-operated with a two-position gas regulator and a short stroke gas piston. It also features a cross bolt safety. Tavor TS12 is it compact, easy to use and maintain, and with a large magazine capacity, it is ideal for defense, as well as tactical use.

translation.value: Attachment slots: Scope. Recoil: Medium\nA special Berserk version of the Tavor TS12В Custom. \n The Tavor TS12 is a 12 gauge bullpup shotgun with the ability to be configured for left- or right-handed ejection and operation. It is gas-operated, with a two-position gas regulator and a short-stroke gas piston. It also features a cross-bolt safety. The Tavor TS12 is compact, easy to use and maintain, and offers a large magazine capacity. It is ideal for defense, as well as tactical use.

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope Recoil: Low\nSpecial version of Rune Tommy Gun M1928\nThe Thompson M1928 is a select-fire submachine gun designed and developed in the United States. It was manufactured by Auto-Ordnance and chambered in the popular .45 ACP ammunition. The Thompson submachine gun was famously used during the Prohibition era used by law enforcement individuals, marines and mafia criminals.

translation.value: Attachment slots: Scope Recoil: Low\nA special Berserk version of the Thompson M1928\nThe Thompson M1928 is a select-fire submachine gun designed and developed in the United States. original.value: Rune Orsis T-5000

translation.value: Berserk Orsis T-5000

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Low\nSpecial Rune version of Orsis T-5000.\nThe Orsis T-5000 is a Russian bolt-action sniper rifle. It was the first product developed by ORSIS, and is produced in their Moscow factory. The rifle was introduced in 2011 at the international exhibition of Russian weapons in Nizhny Tagil. The Sniper Rifle has high accuracy and high chance to make one shot kill. Now even protective gloves and protective shoes won't save your enemies at close quarters and middle distances.

translation.value: Attachment slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Low\nA special Berserk version of the Orsis T-5000.\nThe Orsis T-5000 is a Russian bolt-action sniper rifle. It was the first product developed by ORSIS and is manufactured in their Moscow factory. The rifle was introduced in 2011 at an international exhibition of Russian weapons in Nizhny Tagil. The sniper rifle has high accuracy and a high chance to kill with one shot. Now even protective gloves and shoes won't save your enemies at close quarters and medium range.

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium Special version of Rune Truvelo CMS 20x42mm. Have unique attachment Truvelo CMS Special Suppressor, Truvelo CMS Tactical Suppressor. Truvelo CMS is a family of South African anti-material rifles, and the 20x42mm variation is simultaneously one of the smallest and the strongest of the bunch. Developed for airborne deployments into enemy territory, it is quite compact and lightweight for its class, yet packs a very powerful punch due to it's monstrous 20x42mm ammunition.

This particular version is chambered in 5.45x39 mm, so it trades a bit of accuracy for a bigger punch and better penetration.

original.value: Halloween Marlin 1894 Custom

translation.value: Poltergeist Marlin 1894 Custom

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium Have unique attachment Viper MOA, Osprey 9 Silencer Special "Halloween" version of Marlin 1894 Custom. The Marlin 1894 is a traditional lever-action rifle that's quick handling, and delivers rapid fire with a powerful cartridge. Originally patented on August 1, 1893 by L.L. Hepburn, the Model 1894 features a revolutionary lever-fire system with repeat-fire capability. The Model 1894 included a new locking bolt and two-piece firing pin, alongside an improved one-piece trigger and a short receiver that enabled cartridge compatibility with 1888 and 1889 models.

translation.value: Attachment Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium Has unique attachments Viper MOA, Osprey 9 Silencer A special "Poltergeist" version of Marlin 1894 Custom. Marlin 1894 is a traditional lever-action rifle that's quick to handle and delivers rapid fire with a powerful cartridge. Originally patented on August 1, 1893 by L.L. Hepburn, the Model 1894 features a revolutionary lever-fire system with repeat-fire capability. The Model 1894 included a new locking bolt and two-piece firing pin, alongside an improved one-piece trigger and a short receiver that enabled cartridge compatibility with 1888 and 1889 models.

Compared to most other SMGs, .45 ACP offers a superb punch and stopping power. Already compact, SMG-45 also features a folding grip and fully ambidextrous controls, making it very comfortable to handle.

original.value: Gold AS-"VAL"

translation.value: Golden AS 'VAL'

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope . Recoil: High Golden version of AS-"VAL". This weapon deal increased damage against cyborgs on 50%. The AS "Val" (Avtomat Special'nyj Val, Special Automatic Rifle, code name: "Shaft") is a Soviet designed assault rifle featuring an integrated suppressor. It was developed during the late 1980s by TsNIITochMash and is used by Russian Spetsnaz special forces and the MVD, FSB and select units of the Russian Army. Since 1987, it was added to the arsenal of the Soviet Army and the KGB. Its effective range is approximately 300 m, as it uses heavy subsonic 9x39mm SP-6 (high performance armor piercing) ammunition, as well as the SP-5 ball round used by the VSS Vintorez.

translation.value: Attachment Slots: Rail, Scope . Recoil: High Golden version of AS 'VAL'. This weapon deals increased by 50% damage against cyborgs. Since 1987, it was added to the arsenal of the Soviet Army and the KGB. Its effective range is approximately 300 m, as it uses heavy subsonic 9x39mm SP-6 (high performance armor piercing) ammunition, as well as the SP-5 ball round used by the VSS Vintorez.

original.value: Corporation Ak-Alpha

translation.value: Onyx AK Alpha

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nSpecial Corporation version of AK-Alfa\nThe AK-Alfa is a revolutionary approach to weapons upgrades. A handpicked team of snipers and engineers from the IDF Special Forces designed the Alfa rifle to allow the shooter to maximize his shooting abilities, with the most reliable weapon on the planet. An iconic firearms platform now reborn as the new Israeli Kalashnikov to be the apex of technology. The weapon's unique features include comfortable recoil, high rate of fire and heavy-piercing bullet with additional damage to limbs and additional damage at long ranges. AK-Alpha staffed with Tactical Silencer, AK-Alpha suppressor, Tactical Grip, Sig Sauer Romeo 4 RDS and Hartman MH1 RDS.

original.value: Corporation AK-12

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium Special Corporation version of AK-12 Have unique attachment AK-12 SpecialSuppressor, AK-12 Special Silencer, AK-12 Special Grip, Romeo 4 Sight. The AK-12 is a modern assault rifle designed to replace the legendary AK-74 as the general issue weapon for the Russian army. The weapon introduces many improvements over its predecessors: better recoil control, suitable for various ammunition types, compatibility with several accessories, and better ergonomics. This particular version is chambered in 5.45x39 mm, so it trades a bit of accuracy for a bigger punch and better penetration.

original.value: Corporation Marlin 1894 Custom

translation.value: Onyx Marlin 1894 Custom

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium Have unique attachment Viper MOA, Osprey 9 Silencer Special Corporation version of Marlin 1894 Custom. The Marlin 1894 is a traditional lever-action rifle that's quick handling, and delivers rapid fire with a powerful cartridge. Originally patented on August 1, 1893 by L.L. Hepburn, the Model 1894 features a revolutionary lever-fire system with repeat-fire capability. The Model 1894 included a new locking bolt and two-piece firing pin, alongside an improved one-piece trigger and a short receiver that enabled cartridge compatibility with 1888 and 1889 models.

AK-12 is a modern assault rifle designed to replace the legendary AK-74 as the general issue weapon for the Russian army. The weapon introduces many improvements over its predecessors: better recoil control, suitable for various ammunition types, compatibility with several accessories, and better ergonomics. This particular version is chambered in 5.45x39 mm, so it trades a bit of accuracy for a bigger punch and better penetration.

original.value: Black Friday Marlin 1894 Custom

translation.value: Great Gatsby Marlin 1894 Custom

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium Have unique attachment Viper MOA, Osprey 9 Silencer Special "Black Friday" version of Marlin 1894 Custom. The Marlin 1894 is a traditional lever-action rifle that's quick handling, and delivers rapid fire with a powerful cartridge. Originally patented on August 1, 1893 by L.L. Hepburn, the Model 1894 features a revolutionary lever-fire system with repeat-fire capability. The Model 1894 included a new locking bolt and two-piece firing pin, alongside an improved one-piece trigger and a short receiver that enabled cartridge compatibility with 1888 and 1889 models.

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope Recoil: Low\nSpecial "Black Friday" version of Rune Tommy Gun M1928\nThe Thompson M1928 is a select-fire submachine gun designed and developed in the United States. original.value: Black Friday Remington MSR

translation.value: Great Gatsby Remington MSR

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium Special "Black Friday" version of Remington MSR Has unique attachment Bushnell 4x scope and Remington MSR suppressor. Remington MSR is a light aluminium bolt-action sniper rifle developed in late 00s by Remington Arms. MSR stands for Modular Sniper Rifle, as the caliber of the weapon can quickly be changed between .338, .300 and 7.62 via the barrel and bolt swap. This a modern and precise gun, if a bit pricey. US military has already adopted MSR into service, as well as several other countries.

The G28 is a military version of the civilian semi automatic competition rifle MR308. Deployed in the established 7.62 x 51 calibre, the Designated Marksman Rifle DMR ensures accuracy of 1.5 MOA whilst enabling a full night fighting capability. Providing a maximum effective range and a high first round hit probability up to 600 meters, the HK241 will also allow suppressive fire against man size targets accurately up to 800 meters.

original.value: Xmas 2019 Gepard GM6 Lynx

translation.value: Rime Gepard GM6 Lynx

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope. Recoil: Medium This weapon deal increased damage against cyborgs on 50%. Has unique attachment Schmidt & Bender v2 4.6x scope. Xmas 2019 version of Gepard GM6 Lynx. Gepard GM6 Lynx is a Hungarian semi-automatic anti-material rifle, developed in the late 80s. Featuring a bullpup layout and a sliding barrel, it is relatively compact for a weapon with such firepower. The weight distribution of the gun also allows to operate the rifle in off-hand hand position, which is much more difficult when it comes to other high-caliber rifles.

The development of the original SAP6 shotgun sought to overcome many of the shortfalls of the common and dated shotgun design. The use of a detachable magazine allows for a shorter barrel without the sacrifice of magazine capacity.

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nSpecial Hydra version of AK-Alfa\nThe AK-Alfa is a revolutionary approach to weapons upgrades. A handpicked team of snipers and engineers from the IDF Special Forces designed the Alfa rifle to allow the shooter to maximize his shooting abilities, with the most reliable weapon on the planet. An iconic firearms platform now reborn as the new Israeli Kalashnikov to be the apex of technology. The weapon's unique features include comfortable recoil, high rate of fire and heavy-piercing bullet with additional damage to limbs and additional damage at long ranges. AK-Alpha staffed with Tactical Silencer, AK-Alpha suppressor, Tactical Grip, Sig Sauer Romeo 4 RDS and Hartman MH1 RDS.

A handpicked team of snipers and engineers from the IDF Special Forces designed the Alpha rifle to allow the shooter to maximize his shooting abilities, with the most reliable weapon on the planet. An iconic firearms platform now reborn as the new Israeli Kalashnikov to be the apex of technology. The weapon's unique features include comfortable recoil, high rate of fire and heavy-piercing bullet with additional damage to limbs and additional damage at long ranges. AK-Alpha is staffed with Tactical Silencer, AK-Alpha suppressor, Tactical Grip, Sig Sauer Romeo 4 RDS and Hartman MH1 RDS.

original.value: Hydra Kraken CDX MC

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium Special Hydra version of Kraken CDX MC. Have unique attachment Defence Falcon Bipod, Cadex Defence Precision Silencer, Kraken Special Suppressor, ATACR 4.5x scope. The CDX-MC KRAKEN, is a multi-caliber rifle using an innovative (patent pending) barrel change system. This multi-caliber system features the lowest shift of point of impact between takedown and reassembly of the same barrel on the market. A single screw secures the chassis detachable base for a fast conversion between short and long action calibers.

original.value: Cobalt Kinetics Twenty-Seven

translation.value: Cobalt Kinetics Twenty-Seven

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium This weapon deal increased damage against cyborgs on 50%. Has unique attachment TI-RAID Silencer, Pro Muzzle Brake, HALO MiniVert Grip V3, UTG Compact Scope, Holosun MK4. The G28 is a military version of the civilian semi automatic competition rifle MR308. Deployed in the established 7.62 x 51 calibre, the Designated Marksman Rifle DMR ensures accuracy of 1.5 MOA whilst enabling a full night fighting capability. Providing a maximum effective range and a high first round hit probability up to 600 meters, the HK241 will also allow suppressive fire against man size targets accurately up to 800 meters.

translation.value: Attachment Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium This weapon deals increased by 50% damage against cyborgs. A special development by Cobalt Kinetics that combines the classic charm of a hunting shotgun and the convenience of a modern selective-fire rifle. Configure the telescopic stock at any moment according to your shooting position.

original.value: Circus AK-12

translation.value: Jester AK-12

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nSpecial Circus version of AK-12\nThe AK-12 is a modern assault rifle designed to replace the legendary AK-74 as the general issue weapon for the Russian army. The weapon introduces many improvements over its predecessors: better recoil control, suitable for various ammunition types, compatibility with several accessories, and better ergonomics. This particular version is chambered in 5.45x39 mm, so it trades a bit of accuracy for a bigger punch and better penetration.

translation.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nSpecial Jester version of AK-12\nThe AK-12 is a modern assault rifle designed to replace the legendary AK-74 as the general issue weapon for the Russian army. The weapon introduces many improvements over its predecessors: better recoil control, suitable for various ammunition types, compatibility with several accessories, and better ergonomics. This particular version is chambered in 5.45x39 mm, so it trades a bit of accuracy for a bigger punch and better penetration.

S&W M&P R8 features modern design, high damage and high accuracy.

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Low\nSpecial Circus version of AM-17.\nThe AM-17 is a new weapon, developed by the “Kalashnikov” Concern. Based on the previous AM prototype, AM-17 is intended for military and law enforcement use as a CQB weapon or as a Personal Defense Weapon.

original.value: Circus Uzkon UNG-12

translation.value: Jester Uzkon UNG-12

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium Special Circus version of Uzkon UNG-12. The Uzkon UNG-12 is a shotgun of Turkish origin manufactured by Uzkon. The Uzkon UNG-12 is an eye-catching bull-pup automatic, magazine-fed shotgun sporting a futuristic design and a reinforced polymer lower / machined aluminum upper construction. It is massive in dimensions not your standard, small sized bullpup and offers a fairly intuitive controls configuration, with a cross-button safety located over the trigger guard and a cocking handle located on the left side of the upper receiver.

translation.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium Special Jester version of Uzkon UNG-12. The Uzkon UNG-12 is a shotgun of Turkish origin manufactured by Uzkon. The Uzkon UNG-12 is an eye-catching bull-pup automatic, magazine-fed shotgun sporting a futuristic design and a reinforced polymer lower / machined aluminum upper construction. It is massive in dimensions not your standard, small sized bullpup and offers a fairly intuitive controls configuration, with a cross-button safety located over the trigger guard and a cocking handle located on the left side of the upper receiver.

original.value: Circus Truvelo CMS 20x42mm

translation.value: Jester Truvelo CMS 20x42mm

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: High\nSpecial Circus version of Truvelo CMS 20x42mm.\nTruvelo CMS is a family of South African anti-material rifles, and the 20x42mm variation is simultaneously one of the smallest and the strongest of the bunch. Developed for airborne deployments into enemy territory, it is quite compact and lightweight for its class, yet packs a very powerful punch due to it's monstrous 20x42mm ammunition.

original.value: Gorgona AK-47

translation.value: Particle AK-47

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nSpecial "Gorgona" version of AK-47.\nThe AK-47 is a selective-fire, gas-operated 7.62Рx39mm assault rifle, first developed in the USSR by Mikhail Kalashnikov. It is also known as a Kalashnikov, an "AK", or in Russian slang, Kalash. Even after six decades the model and its variants remain the most widely used and popular assault rifles in the world because of their durability, low production cost, and ease of use.

translation.value: Attachment's Slots: Muzzle. original.value: Gorgona AS VAL

translation.value: Particle AS VAL

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope. Recoil: High\nSpecial "Gorgona" version of AS VAL.\nThe AS "Val" (Avtomat Special'nyj Val, Special Automatic Rifle, code name: "Shaft") is a Soviet designed assault rifle featuring an integrated suppressor. It was developed during the late 1980s by TsNIITochMash and is used by Russian Spetsnaz special forces and the MVD, FSB and select units of the Russian Army. Since 1987, it was added to the arsenal of the Soviet Army and the KGB. Its effective range is approximately 300 m, as it uses heavy subsonic 9x39mm SP-6 (high performance armor piercing) ammunition, as well as the SP-5 ball round used by the VSS Vintorez.

translation.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope. Recoil: High\nSpecial "Particle" version of AS VAL.\nThe AS "Val" (Avtomat Special'nyj Val, Special Automatic Rifle, code name: "Shaft") is a Soviet designed assault rifle featuring an integrated suppressor. original.value: Premium Gorgona AK-12

translation.value: Gorgon AK-12

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium Special Premium Gorgona version of AK-12 Have unique attachment AK-12 Special Suppressor, AK-12 Special Silencer, AK-12 Special Grip, Romeo 4 Sight. The AK-12 is a modern assault rifle designed to replace the legendary AK-74 as the general issue weapon for the Russian army. The weapon introduces many improvements over its predecessors: better recoil control, suitable for various ammunition types, compatibility with several accessories, and better ergonomics. This particular version is chambered in 5.45x39 mm, so it trades a bit of accuracy for a bigger punch and better penetration.

original.value: Medusa AK-12

translation.value: Medusa AK-12

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium Special Medusa version of AK-12 Have unique attachment AK-12 Special Suppressor, AK-12 Special Silencer, AK-12 Special Grip, Romeo 4 Sight. The AK-12 is a modern assault rifle designed to replace the legendary AK-74 as the general issue weapon for the Russian army. The weapon introduces many improvements over its predecessors: better recoil control, suitable for various ammunition types, compatibility with several accessories, and better ergonomics. This particular version is chambered in 5.45x39 mm, so it trades a bit of accuracy for a bigger punch and better penetration.

It is gas-operated with a two-position gas regulator and a short stroke gas piston. It also features a cross bolt safety. Tavor TS12 is it compact, easy to use and maintain, and with a large magazine capacity, it is ideal for defense, as well as tactical use.

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nSpecial "Samurai" version of FN FAL DSA 58.\nAmerican company DSA (David Selveggio Arms) manufactures a copy of the FAL called the DSA-58 that is made with the same Steyr-Daimler-Puch production line equipment as the StG-58. Civilian models are semi-automatic, but military and Law Enforcement clients can procure select-fire models that have a fully automatic cyclic rate of 620 rounds/minute. This motel has unique comfortable tactical grip with unique features and heavy-piercing ammo with additional damage to limbs and additional damage at long ranges.

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium Have unique attachment Viper MOA, Osprey 9 Silencer Special "Samurai" version of Marlin 1894 Custom. The Marlin 1894 is a traditional lever-action rifle that's quick handling, and delivers rapid fire with a powerful cartridge. Originally patented on August 1, 1893 by L.L. Hepburn, the Model 1894 features a revolutionary lever-fire system with repeat-fire capability. The Model 1894 included a new locking bolt and two-piece firing pin, alongside an improved one-piece trigger and a short receiver that enabled cartridge compatibility with 1888 and 1889 models.

The F90 is a lightweight assault rifle manufactured by Thales Australia to provide soldiers with increased firepower on the battlefield. original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Middle\n Special "Apache" version of Tavor TS12 Custom. \n The Tavor TS12 is a 12 gauge bullpup shotgun with the capability of being configured for left- or right-handed ejection and operation. It is gas-operated with a two-position gas regulator and a short stroke gas piston. It also features a cross bolt safety. Tavor TS12 is it compact, easy to use and maintain, and with a large magazine capacity, it is ideal for defense, as well as tactical use.

The ACR CQB Custom is variation of The Adaptive Combat Rifle (abbreviated ACR) which was a United States Army program to find a replacement for the M16 assault rifle. The program's total cost is approximately $300 million US Dollars. Produced by Remington Arms Company.

original.value: Premium Samurai AK-12

translation.value: Golden Dragon AK-12

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium Special Premium Samurai version of AK-12 Have unique attachment AK-12 Special Suppressor, AK-12 Special Silencer, AK-12 Special Grip, Romeo 4 Sight. The AK-12 is a modern assault rifle designed to replace the legendary AK-74 as the general issue weapon for the Russian army. The weapon introduces many improvements over its predecessors: better recoil control, suitable for various ammunition types, compatibility with several accessories, and better ergonomics. This particular version is chambered in 5.45x39 mm, so it trades a bit of accuracy for a bigger punch and better penetration.

The Howa Type 89, referred to as the type 89 5.56mm rifle, is a Japanese assault rifle used by the Japan Self-Defense Force, the Japan Coast Guard's Special Security Team units, and the Special Assault Team. It was never exported outside Japan due to its strict anti-hardware export policy. It is known in JGSDF service as Buddy. The Japanese military are very proud of their product and consider this rifle the best of the best!

With only one ammo tube instead of two, it is much lighter and slimmer, and provides user with overall more ergonomic experience.

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope. Recoil: Low\n Special Open Cup 2020 version of Kel-Tec SUB2000.\n SUB2000 is a lightweight 9mm carbine from Kel-Tec. original.value: Howa Type 89 Custom Open Cup 2020

translation.value: Howa Type 89 Custom Warface.Pro I

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium Special Open Cup 2020 version of Howa Type 89. Have unique attachment JCOMP Gen 2 Suppressor, Viking Tactics Vertical Grip, Howa Type 89 Reflex Sight. The Howa Type 89, referred to as the type 89 5.56mm rifle, is a Japanese assault rifle used by the Japan Self-Defense Force, the Japan Coast Guard's Special Security Team units, and the Special Assault Team. It was never exported outside Japan due to its strict anti-hardware export policy. It is known in JGSDF service as Buddy. The Japanese military are very proud of their product and consider this rifle the best of the best!

translation.value: Attachment Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium Special Warface.Pro I version of Howa Type 89. Has unique attachments JCOMP Gen 2 Suppressor, Viking Tactics Vertical Grip, Howa Type 89 Reflex Sight. Howa Type 89, referred to as the type 89 5.56mm rifle, is a Japanese assault rifle used by the Japan Self-Defense Force, the Japan Coast Guard's Special Security Team units, and the Special Assault Team. It was never exported outside of Japan due to its strict anti-hardware export policy. It is known in JGSDF service as "Buddy". The Japanese military are very proud of their product and consider this rifle the best of the best!

The high-speed machine gun provides excellent firepower. It is necessary to carefully monitor the temperature of the weapon, because it overheats much faster than other machine guns SED uses.

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium Special Spades version of F90 MBR. Have unique attachment F90 MBR Special Grip. F90 is a lightweight assault rifle manufactured by Thales Australia to provide soldiers with increased firepower in the battlefield.Assault Rifle is well suited for use with amphibious forces, enabling operators to swim with the weapon and fire the weapon immediately and reliably after emergence from the water.

translation.value: Attachment Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium Special Spades version of the F90 MBR. Exclusive attachment: F90 MBR Special Grip. The F90 is a lightweight assault rifle manufactured by Thales Australia to provide soldiers with increased firepower on the battlefield. This assault rifle is well-suited for use by amphibious forces, enabling users to swim with the weapon and fire it immediately and reliably after emerging from the water.

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Middle\nSpecial Spades version of Tavor TS12 Custom. \n The Tavor TS12 is a 12 gauge bullpup shotgun with the capability of being configured for left- or right-handed ejection and operation. It is gas-operated with a two-position gas regulator and a short stroke gas piston. It also features a cross bolt safety. Tavor TS12 is it compact, easy to use and maintain, and with a large magazine capacity, it is ideal for defense, as well as tactical use.

There's nothing else like it. And it is only available from SIG.

original.value: Spades Truvelo CMS 20x42mm

translation.value: Spades Truvelo CMS 20x42mm

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Muzzle. Recoil: Medium Special Spades version of Truvelo CMS 20x42mm. Have unique attachment Truvelo CMS Special Suppressor, Truvelo CMS Tactical Suppressor. This weapon deal increased damage against cyborgs on 200%. Truvelo CMS is a family of South African anti-material rifles, and the 20x42mm variation is simultaneously one of the smallest and the strongest of the bunch. Developed for airborne deployments into enemy territory, it is quite compact and lightweight for its class, yet packs a very powerful punch due to it's monstrous 20x42mm ammunition.

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: High\nSpecial Lake Bird version of the M16A3. \n The M16A3 Custom, now standard issue for front-line U.S. Marine Corps and some U.S. Army units, replaces the combination fixed carry handle/rear iron sight with a MIL-STD-1913 Picatinny rail, allowing for the rifle to be equipped with a carry handle and/or most military and consumer scopes or sighting systems.

translation.value: Attachment Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: High\nSpecial Lake Bird version of the M16A3. \n The M16A3 Custom, now standard issue for front-line U.S. Marine Corps and some U.S. Army units, replaces the combination fixed carry handle/rear iron sight with a MIL-STD-1913 Picatinny rail, allowing for the rifle to be equipped with a carry handle and/or most military and consumer scopes or sighting systems.

original.value: Lake Bird Glock 18C

translation.value: Lake Bird Glock 18C

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Muzzle\n Special Lake Bird version of the Glock 18C.\n The Glock 18 is a selective fire variant of the Glock 17, developed at the request of the Austrian counter-terrorist unit EKO Cobra. This machine pistol-class firearm has a lever-type fire-control selector. With the selector lever in the bottom position, the pistol will shoot fully automatic. The firearm is typically used with an extended 33-round capacity magazine.

This weapon deals increased damage to the body and extremities. HCAR is a modernized version of the legendary BAR rifle, produced by Ohio Ordnance Works. The original BAR have seen action in both World Wars, and HCAR is a worthy successor for such a venerated ancestor. This semi-automatic rifle uses powerful .30-06 ammo, packing a superb punch. Compared to its predecessor, it also boasts greatly reduced weight and improved ergonomics.

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium Special Lightcycle version of Uzkon UNG-12. The Uzkon UNG-12 is a shotgun of Turkish origin manufactured by Uzkon. The Uzkon UNG-12 is an eye-catching bull-pup automatic, magazine-fed shotgun sporting a futuristic design and a reinforced polymer lower / machined aluminum upper construction. It is massive in dimensions not your standard, small sized bullpup and offers a fairly intuitive controls configuration, with a cross-button safety located over the trigger guard and a cocking handle located on the left side of the upper receiver.

Already compact, SMG-45 also features a folding grip and fully ambidextrous controls, making it very comfortable to handle.

original.value: Favelas AK-Alpha

translation.value: Guardian AK Alpha

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nSpecial Favelas version of Ak-Alpha\nThe Ak-Alpha is a revolutionary approach to weapons upgrades. A handpicked team of snipers and engineers from the IDF Special Forces designed the Alfa rifle to allow the shooter to maximize his shooting abilities, with the most reliable weapon on the planet. An iconic firearms platform now reborn as the new Israeli Kalashnikov to be the apex of technology. The weapon's unique features include comfortable recoil, high rate of fire and heavy-piercing bullet with additional damage to limbs and additional damage at long ranges. AK-Alpha staffed with Tactical Silencer, AK-Alpha suppressor, Tactical Grip, Sig Sauer Romeo 4 RDS and Hartman MH1 RDS.

translation.value: Attachment Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium\nGuardian version of the AK Alpha.\nThe AK Alpha is a revolutionary approach to weapons upgrades. A handpicked team of snipers and engineers from the IDF Special Forces designed the Alpha rifle to allow the shooter to maximize his shooting abilities with the most reliable weapon on the planet. An iconic firearms platform now reborn as the new Israeli Kalashnikov as the apex of technology. The weapon's unique features include comfortable recoil, high rate of fire, and heavy-piercing bullets with additional damage to limbs and additional damage at long ranges. The AK Alpha can be fitted with a Tactical Silencer, AK-Alpha suppressor, Tactical Grip, Sig Sauer Romeo 4 RDS, and Hartman MH1 RDS.

original.value: Favelas HCAR

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium Special Favelas version of HCAR This weapon deals double damage to the body and extremities.<> This weapon deals increased damage against cyborgs on 50%. HCAR is a modernized version of the legendary BAR rifle, produced by Ohio Ordnance Works. The original BAR have seen action in both World Wars, and HCAR is a worthy successor for such a venerated ancestor. This semi-automatic rifle uses powerful .30-06 ammo, packing a superb punch. Compared to its predecessor, it also boasts greatly reduced weight and improved ergonomics.

translation.value: Attachment Slots: Rail, Scope, Muzzle. Recoil: Medium Guardian version of the HCAR. This weapon deals double damage to the body and limbs.<> This weapon deals 50% more damage against cyborgs. The HCAR is a modernized version of the legendary BAR rifle, produced by Ohio Ordnance Works. The original BAR saw action in both World Wars, and the HCAR is a worthy successor to such a venerated ancestor. This semi-automatic rifle uses powerful .30-06 ammo, packing a superb punch. Compared to its predecessor, it also boasts greatly reduced weight and improved ergonomics.

This machine pistol-class firearm has a lever-type fire-control selector. With the selector lever in the bottom position, the pistol will shoot fully automatic. The firearm is typically used with an extended 33-round capacity magazine.

original.value: Favelas Dragunov SVU-AS

translation.value: Guardian Dragunov SVU-AS

original.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope. Recoil: Low This weapon deal increased damage against cyborgs on 50%.< Special Favelas version of Dragunov SVU-AS The OTs-03 SVU aka Sniper Rifle Shortened is a bullpup configuration of the SVD sniper rifle. The SVU was developed to meet the needs of the security forces of the Russian Ministry of Internal Affairs, such as OMON. A special muzzle brake was added that could absorb up to 40% of the recoil energy and an elastic butt stock with lamellar spring was non-rigidly attached to the receiver. The acoustics of the rifle were also improved by adding a sound suppressor. The other main improvements made to the SVU over the SVD include replacement of the butt stock, pistol grip, trigger and the mounting for the sight; and shortening the barrel by 100 mm achieved perfect balance for the weapon.

translation.value: Attachment's Slots: Rail, Scope. Recoil: Low This weapon deals increased damage against cyborgs on 50%.< Guardian version of Dragunov SVU-AS The Dragunov SVU-AS is inspired by the AST-41 Dragunov SR, based on the SVT, which was developed to meet the needs of the security forces of the Russian Ministry of Internal Affairs. A special muzzle brake absorbing up to 40% of the recoil was added, and an elastic butt stock with lamellar spring was non-rigidly attached to the receiver. The acoustics of the rifle were also improved by adding a sound suppressor. It also features an upgraded butt stock, pistol grip, trigger and mount for a sight. Finally, shortening the barrel by 100 mm ensured its perfect balance.

The CDX-MC KRAKEN, is a multi-caliber rifle using an innovative (patent pending) barrel change system. This multi-caliber system features the lowest shift of point of impact between takedown and reassembly of the same barrel on the market. A single screw secures the chassis detachable base for a fast conversion between short and long action calibers.

The weapon is intended for use as a close quarters weapon, primarily for special units of the Russian Interior Ministry and the Russian Army to replace the AS Val and VSS Vintorez firearms.
